5222.en: <voice 00070_00005222><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>And... there. That's warm, isn't it?<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5222.ja:
<voice 00070_00005222><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「う……んと。あったかさは
　これっくらいで　いい……よね。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5222.ko:
<voice 00070_00005222><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 어디 보자…….
　온도는 이 정도면 괜찮……겠지?<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5222.zh-Hans:
<voice 00070_00005222><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>嗯……我想想，大概这个温度
就可以……了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5222.zh-Hant:
<voice 00070_00005222><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>嗯……我想想，大概這個溫度，
就可以……了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5223.en: <voice 00265_00005223><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Uhh... Who are you? I'm Somya.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5223.ja:
<voice 00265_00005223><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「あの……。あなたは誰？
　私は　ソーミャ。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5223.ko:
<voice 00265_00005223><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 저기……. 당신 누구야?
　난 소먀.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5223.zh-Hans:
<voice 00265_00005223><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>请问……你是谁？
我是索米娅。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5223.zh-Hant:
<voice 00265_00005223><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>請問……你是誰？
我是莎米亞。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5224.en:
<voice 00295_00005224><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>What can I do for you? I'm the only one here. There
aren't any adults.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5224.ja:
<voice 00295_00005224><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「何か　ご用なの？　
　ここには　私しかいないよ。
　オトナの人も　いないから。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5224.ko:
<voice 00295_00005224><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 무슨 볼일이라도 있어? 
　여기에는 나밖에 없는데.
　어른은 아무도 없어.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5224.zh-Hans:
<voice 00295_00005224><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>有什么事吗？
这里只有我在，
大人都不在。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5224.zh-Hant:
<voice 00295_00005224><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>有什麼事嗎？
這裡只有我在，
大人都不在。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5225.en: <voice 00345_00005225><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>...I'm the only one left of my family.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5225.ja:
<voice 00345_00005225><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「……私の家族は　もう
　あの子しか　いないもの。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5225.ko:
<voice 00345_00005225><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: ……내 가족은 이제
　그 아이밖에 없으니까.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5225.zh-Hans:
<voice 00345_00005225><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>……我的家人
就剩下那孩子了。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5225.zh-Hant:
<voice 00345_00005225><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>……我的家人
就剩下那孩子了。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5226.en: <voice 00430_00005226><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>I'll be heading out shortly. So you'll have to leave.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5226.ja:
<voice 00430_00005226><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「私　これから　でかけるの。
　だから　出てって。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5226.ko:
<voice 00430_00005226><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 난 이제 외출해야 돼.
　그러니까 나가 줘.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5226.zh-Hans:
<voice 00430_00005226><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我要出门，
所以你出去吧。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5226.zh-Hant:
<voice 00430_00005226><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我要出門，
所以你出去吧。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5227.en:
<voice 00500_00005227><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Oh, that's right. If you're strong enough to have a
Mark of Adulthood, you should go see the mayor.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5227.ja:
<voice 00500_00005227><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「そうだ。あなたが　一人前の証を
　持ってるくらい　しっかりした人なら
　町長さんの所へ行くと　いいよ。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5227.ko:
<voice 00500_00005227><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 그렇지, 당신이 모험가의 증표를
　가지고 있을 정도로 실력이 있는 사람이면
　촌장님 댁에 가 봐.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5227.zh-Hans:
<voice 00500_00005227><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>对了，您如果是持有
合格者的证明那样可靠的人，
就去找镇长吧。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5227.zh-Hant:
<voice 00500_00005227><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>對了，您如果是持有
合格者之證那樣可靠的人，
就去找鎮長吧。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5228.en:
<voice 00530_00005228><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>It seems like he was looking for someone strong. The
mayor's house is in the northeast part of town, to the
left of the church.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5228.ja:
<voice 00530_00005228><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「なんだか　強い人を探してたみたい。
　町長さんの家は　町の北東にある教会の
　向かって左側の家が　そうなの。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5228.ko:
<voice 00530_00005228><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 강한 사람을 찾고 계신다고 들었거든.
　촌장님 댁은 마을 북동쪽에 있는 교회의
　왼쪽에 있는 집이야.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5228.zh-Hans:
<voice 00530_00005228><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>他好像在寻找强者。
这镇子的东北方有个教会。
面对教会，左侧那座房子就是镇长家了。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5228.zh-Hant:
<voice 00530_00005228><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>他好像在尋找強者。
鎮長的家就是面對小鎮東北方的教會
左轉的那棟房子。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5229.en:
<voice 00040_00005229><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>...There's a certain someone who's been visiting as
a guest.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5229.ja:
<voice 00040_00005229><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「……その　ある人物というのは
　私の所に来ている　客人だ。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5229.ko:
<voice 00040_00005229><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: ……그 어떤 인물이란 바로
　우리 집에 와 있는 손님일세.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5229.zh-Hans:
<voice 00040_00005229><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>……我想跟你介绍一个人，
他是我的客人。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5229.zh-Hant:
<voice 00040_00005229><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>……我想跟你介紹一個人，
他是我的客人。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5230.en:
<voice 00141_00005230><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Oh, Detective Kinner. This is <pc>. They
said they'd take care of things.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5230.ja:
<voice 00141_00005230><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「おお　キンナー殿。この　<pc>君が
　引き受けると　言ってくれましたぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5230.ko:
<voice 00141_00005230><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 오오, 킨나 님. 여기 있는 {pc}|hpp(이,가)
　도와주겠다고 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5230.zh-Hans:
<voice 00141_00005230><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>哦哦，金那阁下。
<pc>答应下来了。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5230.zh-Hant:
<voice 00141_00005230><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>喔喔，金那閣下。這位<pc>說
他願意接下喔。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5231.en:
<voice 00180_00005231><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>This is Mr. Kinner from Verinard Castle. He's a
researcher at the ruins.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5231.ja:
<voice 00180_00005231><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「こちらは　ヴェリナード城から参られた
　キンナー殿だ。遺跡の調査員をしておられる。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5231.ko:
<voice 00180_00005231><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 이분은 베리나드성에서 오신
　킨나 님이다. 유적 조사원이시지.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5231.zh-Hans:
<voice 00180_00005231><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>这位是从威里纳德城来的
金那大人。他是遗迹的调查员。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5231.zh-Hant:
<voice 00180_00005231><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>這位是從威里納德城來的
金那大人。他是遺跡的調查家。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5232.en:
<voice 00235_00005232><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Nice to meet you. I'm Kinner of the Verinard Royal
Survey Team.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5232.ja:
<voice 00235_00005232><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「どうも。ヴェリナード王立調査団の
　キンナーと申します。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5232.ko:
<voice 00235_00005232><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 안녕하세요, 베리나드 왕립 조사단의
　킨나라고 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5232.zh-Hans:
<voice 00235_00005232><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>你好，我是威里纳德王立调查团的
金那。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5232.zh-Hant:
<voice 00235_00005232><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>你好，我是威里納德王立調查團的
金那。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5233.en:
<voice 00255_00005233><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Sorry to bother you, but I have to hurry to the
Sleeping Wisdom Ruins.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5233.ja:
<voice 00255_00005233><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「お忙しいところ　すみませんが
　私は急いで　知恵の眠る遺跡へ
　行かねばなりません。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5233.ko:
<voice 00255_00005233><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 바쁘신데 죄송하지만
　전 한시라도 빨리 지혜가 잠든 유적으로
　가야 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5233.zh-Hans:
<voice 00255_00005233><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>百忙之中打扰了。
我必须赶到智慧沉睡的遗迹去。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5233.zh-Hant:
<voice 00255_00005233><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>百忙中打擾了，
我得盡快趕去
智慧沉睡之遺跡才行。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5234.en: <voice 00341_00005234><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Allow me to explain!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5234.ja: <voice 00341_00005234><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「説明しましょう！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5234.ko: <voice 00341_00005234><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 설명해 드리죠!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5234.zh-Hans: <voice 00341_00005234><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>我来说明一下！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5234.zh-Hant: <voice 00341_00005234><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>我來說明一下！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5235.en:
<voice 00405_00005235><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>The Sleeping Wisdom Ruins contain something very
precious to us Weddie.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5235.ja:
<voice 00405_00005235><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「知恵の眠る遺跡には　我々ウェディにとって
　大切なものが　納められています。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5235.ko:
<voice 00405_00005235><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 지혜가 잠든 유적에는 우리 웨디에게
　아주 중요한 물건이 보관되어 있어요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5235.zh-Hans:
<voice 00405_00005235><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>智慧沉睡的遗迹收藏着
对于我们维迪来说非常重要的东西。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5235.zh-Hant:
<voice 00405_00005235><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>智慧沉睡之遺跡有著
對我們維迪來說很重要的東西。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5236.en:
<voice 00455_00005236><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>But, to my shock, there seems to be signs of
abnormality in that precious place.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5236.ja:
<voice 00455_00005236><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「ですが　ああ　なんということでしょう。
　その大切なものに　異常の兆候が見られました。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5236.ko:
<voice 00455_00005236><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 하지만 아아, 이게 무슨 일인지.
　바로 그 중요한 물건에서
　이상 징후가 관측됐지 뭡니까.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5236.zh-Hans:
<voice 00455_00005236><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>但是，唉，这是何等事态。
那件重要的东西显示出了异常的征兆。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5236.zh-Hant:
<voice 00455_00005236><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>但是，為什麼？
如此重要的東西卻顯現出異常的徵兆。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5237.en:
<voice 00512_00005237><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>If it's a serious anomaly, our future could be in
jeopardy!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5237.ja:
<voice 00512_00005237><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「もし　それが深刻な異常だったなら
　我々の未来が閉ざされる　おそれがあるのです！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5237.ko:
<voice 00512_00005237><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 만약 그 징후가 심각한 거라면
　우리의 미래가 파멸할지도 모릅니다!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5237.zh-Hans:
<voice 00512_00005237><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>如果那种异常很严重的话，
恐怕会毁灭我们的未来！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5237.zh-Hant:
<voice 00512_00005237><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>如果那是嚴重的異常，
我們的未來也許會被封鎖！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5238.en: <voice 00556_00005238><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>And that's where you come in!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5238.ja: <voice 00556_00005238><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「そこで　この私の出番なわけですが！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5238.ko: <voice 00556_00005238><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 그래서 제가 찾아온 건데!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5238.zh-Hans: <voice 00556_00005238><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>所以我必须采取行动！但是……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5238.zh-Hant: <voice 00556_00005238><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>這時候就輪到我出場了！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5239.en:
<voice 00576_00005239><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>There are so many monsters around those ruins that I
can't even get close to them...<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5239.ja:
<voice 00576_00005239><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「その遺跡の周りには　たくさんの魔物がいて
　近づくことも　ままならないのですよ……。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5239.ko:
<voice 00576_00005239><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 그 유적 주변은 워낙 마물이 많아서
　가까이 가기가 쉽지 않거든요…….<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5239.zh-Hans:
<voice 00576_00005239><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>那遗迹的周围有许多怪物，
根本无法靠近……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5239.zh-Hant:
<voice 00576_00005239><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>遺跡附近有許多怪物，
連接近都有困難……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000940.en:
<voice 00619_19000940><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>So I would like you to accompany Mr. Kinner on a
journey to the ruins. You'll be rewarded, of course.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000940.ja:
<voice 00619_19000940><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「そこで　君には　キンナー調査員に
　同行して　遺跡へ　行ってもらいたい。
　それに　ふさわしいだけの礼は　約束しよう。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000940.ko:
<voice 00619_19000940><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 그래서 자네는 킨나 조사원님과
　유적까지 동행해 주었으면 하네.
　그에 상응하는 보답은 약속하지.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000940.zh-Hans:
<voice 00619_19000940><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>所以才想请你
和金那调查员一起去一趟遗迹。
至于酬劳，会令你满意的。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000940.zh-Hant:
<voice 00619_19000940><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>因此，我想請你
跟金那調查員一同前往遺跡。
至於酬勞，會令你滿意的。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000941.en:
<voice 00651_19000941><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>You're not just protecting me but the future of all
Weddie people! I'll be counting on you to give it your
all.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000941.ja:
<voice 00651_19000941><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「あなたが守るのは　私でなく　未来なのです！
　なにとぞ　よろしく　お願いしますよ。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000941.ko:
<voice 00651_19000941><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 당신이 지키는 것은 제가 아니라 미래랍니다!
　모쪼록 잘 부탁드립니다.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000941.zh-Hans:
<voice 00651_19000941><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>你保护的并不是我，而是未来！
万事拜托了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000941.zh-Hant:
<voice 00651_19000941><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>你保護的並不是我，而是未來！
萬事拜託了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000942.de: Kinner tritt der Gruppe bei!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000942.en: Kinner joined the party!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000942.es: ¡Kinner se une al grupo!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000942.fr: Kinner se joint à l'équipe!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000942.it: Kinner si unisce al gruppo!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000942.ja:
キンナーが
パーティに　加わった。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000942.zh-Hans:
金那
加入了队伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000942.zh-Hant:
金那
加入了隊伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>

5242.en:
<voice 00926_00005242><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>To get to King Ladis Island where the ruins are, leave
from the south side of town to Muse Beach, and take a
canoe from the landing. I'm counting on you!<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5242.ja:
<voice 00926_00005242><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「遺跡があるラーディス王島へは　町の南から出て
　ミューズ海岸に行き　そこのカヌー乗り場から
　カヌーに乗っていけばいい。頼んだぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5242.ko:
<voice 00926_00005242><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 유적이 있는 라디스 왕의 섬으로 가려면 마을
　남쪽으로 나간 다음 뮤즈 해안으로 가서 그곳의
　카누 선착장에서 카누를 타면 돼. 잘 부탁하네!<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5242.zh-Hans:
<voice 00926_00005242><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>遗迹位于拉迪斯王岛上，从镇子的南面出去，
在缪兹海岸的独木舟码头乘坐独木舟，
就能抵达那里。那就拜托你了！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5242.zh-Hant:
<voice 00926_00005242><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>要去有遺跡的拉迪斯王島，
只要出了市鎮的南邊，
到繆茲海岸的乘船處搭獨木舟就行了。拜託你了！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5243.en:
<voice 00023_00005243><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>This is where you can board a canoe for King Ladis
Island, my friend.<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5243.ja:
<voice 00023_00005243><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>「ラーディス王島行きの　カヌー乗り場は
　ここですぜ　お客さん。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5243.ko:
<voice 00023_00005243><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>: 라디스 왕의 섬행 카누 선착장은
　여깁니다, 손님.<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5243.zh-Hans:
<voice 00023_00005243><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>前往拉迪斯王岛的独木舟
就是从这里出发的，这位客人。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5243.zh-Hant:
<voice 00023_00005243><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>去拉迪斯王島的獨木舟碼頭
在這裡喔，客人。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5244.en:
<voice 00083_00005244><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>I'm Balouque, the ferryman. Would you like to ride
the canoe?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5244.ja:
<voice 00083_00005244><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>「オイラは　渡し守のバルークってモンです。
　このカヌーに　乗っていきますかい？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5244.ko:
<voice 00083_00005244><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>: 전 나루터지기인 발루크라고 합니다.
　이 카누를 타시겠습니까?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5244.zh-Hans:
<voice 00083_00005244><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>我是渡船人巴尔科。
您要乘坐这只独木舟吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5244.zh-Hant:
<voice 00083_00005244><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>俺是擺渡人巴魯克。
你要搭獨木舟嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5246.en: <voice 00122_00005246><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>Okay, let's go... Come on, get in!<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5246.ja:
<voice 00122_00005246><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>「それじゃあ　さっそく行きますよ。
　ほれ　さっさと　乗って乗って！<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5246.ko:
<voice 00122_00005246><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>: 그럼 바로 출발하겠습니다.
　자, 어서 타십쇼!<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5246.zh-Hans:
<voice 00122_00005246><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>好的，那我们这就出发。
来，您快上来！<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5246.zh-Hant:
<voice 00122_00005246><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>那就出發吧。
快上船吧！<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5245.en:
<voice 00204_00005245><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>Is that so...? Well, I'm always here, so come back
when you want to ride.<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5245.ja:
<voice 00204_00005245><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>「そうですかい……。
　オイラは　いつでも　ここにいますから
　乗りたくなったら　また来ておくんなさい。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5245.ko:
<voice 00204_00005245><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>: 그러시군요…….
　전 계속 여기 있을 테니
　타고 싶어지면 다시 오십쇼.<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5245.zh-Hans:
<voice 00204_00005245><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>是吗……
反正我不会离开这里的。
等需要时再来啊。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5245.zh-Hant:
<voice 00204_00005245><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>……這樣啊。
俺一直都在這，
你要是想搭獨木舟，隨時過來吧。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5247.en: <voice 00727_00005247><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>Whoa! What's up with that girl!?<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5247.ja: <voice 00727_00005247><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>「ややっ　なんですかい　あの娘っ子は！？<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5247.ko: <voice 00727_00005247><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>: 응? 저 여자애는 뭐야!?<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5247.zh-Hans: <voice 00727_00005247><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>哎呀，怎么有个小丫头？！<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5247.zh-Hant: <voice 00727_00005247><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>那ㄚ頭在做什麼！？<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5248.en:
<voice 00887_00005248><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>Honestly, it's not safe for a little girl to be out
here by herself...<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5248.ja:
<voice 00887_00005248><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>「まったく　小さな娘っ子が　こんなとこに
　ひとりで来ちゃあ　危ないってのに……<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5248.ko:
<voice 00887_00005248><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>: 나 원, 저런 어린애가
　이런 곳에 혼자 오면 위험한데……<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5248.zh-Hans:
<voice 00887_00005248><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>真是的，
一个小丫头来这种地方是很危险的……<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5248.zh-Hant:
<voice 00887_00005248><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>受不了，
小ㄚ頭一個人來這種地方很危險的……<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5249.ja: <voice 00917_00005249><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>「うわわっ！？<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5250.en: <voice 01072_00005250><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>Now I've done it. One of the oars snapped clean off!<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5250.ja:
<voice 01072_00005250><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>「しまった　やっちまいました。
　オールのヤツが　ポキリとイッちまった！<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5250.ko:
<voice 01072_00005250><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>: 이런, 야단났군.
　노가 부러지고 말았어!<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5250.zh-Hans:
<voice 01072_00005250><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>惨了，出师不利啊。
您看我这船桨，都断了！<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5250.zh-Hant:
<voice 01072_00005250><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>糟了！
槳居然就這樣斷了！<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5251.en:
<voice 01220_00005251><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>Sorry, friend. I'll go back and fix it, so please
wait for me.<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5251.ja:
<voice 01220_00005251><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>「すんませんねえ　お客さん。
　いったん　戻って　直しますんで
　待っておくんなさい。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5251.ko:
<voice 01220_00005251><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>: 죄송합니다, 손님.
　일단 정박해서 수리할 테니
　조금만 기다려 주십쇼.<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5251.zh-Hans:
<voice 01220_00005251><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>对不住了，这位客人。
我们先暂时返航，
等我把桨修好了，再送您出发好了。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5251.zh-Hant:
<voice 01220_00005251><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>抱歉啊，客人，
我先回去修理，請等等。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5252.en:
<voice 01312_00005252><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>Seems like it's going to take a little while, friend.
If you don't mind, why don't you go check on that girl?<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5252.ja:
<voice 01312_00005252><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>「お客さん　ちいっと時間かかりそうなんで
　よかったら　さっきの娘っ子の様子でも
　見てきちゃあくれませんかい。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5252.ko:
<voice 01312_00005252><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>: 손님, 시간이 좀 걸릴 것 같으니
　괜찮으면 아까 그 여자애를
　살펴보고 와 주시지 않겠습니까?<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5252.zh-Hans:
<voice 01312_00005252><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>这位客人，看来要花不少时间。
要是您愿意，
不如帮我去看看刚才那个小丫头吧。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5252.zh-Hant:
<voice 01312_00005252><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>客人，看來還要點時間，
你要不要去看一下
剛才那個小姑娘如何了。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5253.en:
<voice 01439_00005253><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>I don't know what she's doing here, but make sure you
tell that little girl to go back to town.<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5253.ja:
<voice 01439_00005253><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>「何をしに来たんだか　知んねえが
　あの娘っ子に　町へ帰るように
　それとなく　言ってきておくんなさい。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5253.ko:
<voice 01439_00005253><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>: 뭘 하러 온 건진 모르겠지만
　그 아이에게 마을로 돌아가라고
　잘 좀 얘기해 주십쇼.<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5253.zh-Hans:
<voice 01439_00005253><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>虽然不知道她来这里做什么，
但是您最好想办法
劝那丫头快点回镇里去。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5253.zh-Hant:
<voice 01439_00005253><start_lip_sync n01279 _normal m00001>我不知道她是來做什麼的，
你去暗示一下小ㄚ頭，
讓她回家去吧。<stop_lip_animation n01279 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5254.en: <voice 00100_00005254><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Here... I brought you some milk.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5254.ja: <voice 00100_00005254><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「ほら……。ミルクを持ってきたよ。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5254.ko: <voice 00100_00005254><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 자……. 우유를 가져왔어.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5254.zh-Hans: <voice 00100_00005254><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>看……我给你带牛奶来了。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5254.zh-Hant: <voice 00100_00005254><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>給你……這是牛奶。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5256.en: <voice 00243_00005256><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>There's nothing here! Nothing at all!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5256.ja:
<voice 00243_00005256><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「な……なんにも　ないよ！
　ここには　なんにも　ないんだからっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5256.ko:
<voice 00243_00005256><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 아…… 아무것도 없어!
　여기에는 아무것도 없다니까!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5256.zh-Hans:
<voice 00243_00005256><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>什……什么都没有哦！
这里什么都没有啊！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5256.zh-Hant:
<voice 00243_00005256><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>什……什麼都沒有喔！
這裡什麼都沒有！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

39018.ja: <voice 00304_00039018><start_lip_sync n00347 _normal m00001>「みゃうう……。<stop_lip_animation n00347 CLOSE_MOUTH>

39019.en: <voice 00353_00039019><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Th-that was nothing. Really! Just your imagination!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
39019.ja:
<voice 00353_00039019><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「いっ　今のは　なんでもないよっ。
　そうだよ！　気のせいだよ！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
39019.ko:
<voice 00353_00039019><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 바, 방금 그건 환청이야.
　맞아! 잘못 들은 거야!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
39019.zh-Hans:
<voice 00353_00039019><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>没、没什么！
没错！是你多心了！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
39019.zh-Hant:
<voice 00353_00039019><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>沒、沒什麼啦！
沒錯！是你多心了！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5257.ja: <voice 00414_00005257><start_lip_sync n00347 _normal m00001>「みゃあっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00347 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5258.en: <voice 00588_00005258><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Please! Don't tell anyone about the kitten.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5258.ja:
<voice 00588_00005258><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「お願い！
　この子のことは　誰にも言わないでっ。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5258.ko:
<voice 00588_00005258><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 부탁이야!
　이 아이를 봤단 건 비밀로 해 줘.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5258.zh-Hans:
<voice 00588_00005258><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>求你了！
别把这小家伙的事说出去。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5258.zh-Hant:
<voice 00588_00005258><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>求求你！
別跟任何人提起這孩子。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5259.en:
<voice 00619_00005259><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>...The townspeople are crazy about cats. If they find
out, they'll do terrible things to him!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5259.ja:
<voice 00619_00005259><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「……町の人たちは　ネコが　きらいなの。
　もし　知られたら　この子は　きっと
　ひどいことされちゃう！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5259.ko:
<voice 00619_00005259><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: ……마을 사람들은 고양이를 싫어한단 말이야.
　만약 알게 되면 이 아이한테
　몹쓸 짓을 할 거야!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5259.zh-Hans:
<voice 00619_00005259><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>镇里的人都恨猫……
如果这小家伙被发现的话，
一定会遭到不公对待的！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5259.zh-Hant:
<voice 00619_00005259><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>……鎮上的人們討厭貓。
要是被他們知道，
這孩子的下場一定很慘！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5260.ja: <voice 00698_00005260><start_lip_sync n00347 _normal m00001>「みゃああ！<stop_lip_animation n00347 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5261.en: <voice 00787_00005261><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>I'm sorry. You're hungry, aren't you?<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5261.ja: <voice 00787_00005261><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「ごめんね。おなか　すいてるんだよね。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5261.ko: <voice 00787_00005261><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 미안해. 배고프지?<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5261.zh-Hans: <voice 00787_00005261><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>对不起，饿着你了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5261.zh-Hant: <voice 00787_00005261><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>抱歉，你餓了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5262.en: <voice 00905_00005262><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Don't rush. Slowly, now... That's it.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5262.ja: <voice 00905_00005262><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「あわてないで。ゆっくり……だよ。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5262.ko: <voice 00905_00005262><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 급할 것 없으니까 천천히 먹어…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5262.zh-Hans: <voice 00905_00005262><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>别着急，慢慢来。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5262.zh-Hant: <voice 00905_00005262><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>別急，慢慢來……喔。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5263.ja: <voice 00950_00005263><start_lip_sync n00347 _normal m00001>「みゃうみゃう……。<stop_lip_animation n00347 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5263.zh-Hans: <voice 00950_00005263><start_lip_sync n00347 _normal m00001>喵唔喵唔……<stop_lip_animation n00347 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5263.zh-Hant: <voice 00950_00005263><start_lip_sync n00347 _normal m00001>喵唔喵唔……<stop_lip_animation n00347 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5265.en:
<voice 01085_00005265><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>He washed up in the harbor in town. No one else had
noticed him when I found him.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5265.ja:
<voice 01085_00005265><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「この子は　町の港に流れ着いてて……。
　誰にも　気づかれずにいたのを
　私が最初に　見つけたの。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5265.ko:
<voice 01085_00005265><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 이 아이는 마을 항구에 떠밀려 왔어…….
　다들 못 보고 지나친 걸
　내가 처음 발견한 거야.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5265.zh-Hans:
<voice 01085_00005265><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>这小家伙是漂流到港口来的……
大家都没有看到，
是我先发现的。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5265.zh-Hant:
<voice 01085_00005265><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>這孩子漂到鎮上的港口……
誰也沒發現他，
我是第一個發現的。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5266.en:
<voice 01114_00005266><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>I think he was abandoned by his mom and dad. Just like
me...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5266.ja:
<voice 01114_00005266><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「きっと　この子も
　パパとママに　捨てられたんだ……。
　私と　おんなじ。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5266.ko:
<voice 01114_00005266><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 아마 이 아이도
　부모님한테 버림받은 걸 거야…….
　나랑 똑같아.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5266.zh-Hans:
<voice 01114_00005266><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>这小家伙一定是被爸爸妈妈丢掉了……
和我一样。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5266.zh-Hant:
<voice 01114_00005266><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>那孩子也一定是
被爸爸和媽媽拋棄了……
和我一樣。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5267.en: <voice 01181_00005267><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>So I decided to raise him!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5267.ja: <voice 01181_00005267><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「だから　私が育てることに決めたの！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5267.ko: <voice 01181_00005267><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 그래서 내가 키우기로 결심했어!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5267.zh-Hans: <voice 01181_00005267><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>所以我要把它养大！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5267.zh-Hant: <voice 01181_00005267><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>所以我已經決定自己照顧了！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5268.en: <voice 01245_00005268><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>So please. Please keep this kitten a secret...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5268.ja:
<voice 01245_00005268><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「だから　お願いだよぅ。
　この子のことは　ナイショにして……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5268.ko:
<voice 01245_00005268><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 그러니까 제발 부탁이야.
　이 아이를 본 건 비밀로 해 줘…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5268.zh-Hans:
<voice 01245_00005268><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>所以求你了。
不要把这小家伙的事说出去……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5268.zh-Hant:
<voice 01245_00005268><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>所以，拜託你了。
這孩子的事，要保密喔……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5269.en: <voice 01294_00005269><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>I know I can't keep him here forever, but...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5269.ja:
<voice 01294_00005269><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「いつまでも　ここに置いとくわけに
　いかないのは　わかってるけど……。
　でも……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5269.ko:
<voice 01294_00005269><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 계속 여기 놔둘 수 없단 건 알지만…….
　그래도…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5269.zh-Hans:
<voice 01294_00005269><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我知道不能永远把它藏在这里……
但是……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5269.zh-Hant:
<voice 01294_00005269><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我知道
不能一直把牠放在這裡……
但是……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5270.en: <voice 01383_00005270><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>*Sob, hic* Please...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5270.ja: <voice 01383_00005270><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「ひっくひっく。お願い……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5270.ko: <voice 01383_00005270><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 훌쩍훌쩍. 제발 부탁할게…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5270.zh-Hans: <voice 01383_00005270><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>呜呜，求你了啊……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5270.zh-Hant: <voice 01383_00005270><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>嗚嗚，求求你……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5271.ja: <voice 00120_00005271><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「旅人さん……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5272.en: <voice 00180_00005272><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>I'm begging you, please don't tell anyone about him...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5272.ja:
<voice 00180_00005272><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「お願いだから　この子のことは
　誰にも言わないで……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5272.ko:
<voice 00180_00005272><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 부탁이니까 이 아이를 봤단 건
　아무한테도 말하지 말아 줘…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5272.zh-Hans:
<voice 00180_00005272><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>求你了，
别把这小家伙的事告诉任何人……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5272.zh-Hant:
<voice 00180_00005272><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>求求你，
別跟任何人提起這孩子……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5273.en: <voice 00230_00005273><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>I know I can't keep him here forever, but...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5273.ja:
<voice 00230_00005273><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「いつまでも　ここに置いとくわけに
　いかないのは　わかってるけど……。
　でも……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5273.ko:
<voice 00230_00005273><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 계속 여기 놔둘 수 없단 건 알지만…….
　그래도…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5273.zh-Hans:
<voice 00230_00005273><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我知道不能永远把它藏在这里……
但是……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5273.zh-Hant:
<voice 00230_00005273><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我知道
不能一直把牠放在這裡……
但是……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5274.en: <voice 00296_00005274><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>*Sob, hic*... Please...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5274.ja: <voice 00296_00005274><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「ひっくひっく。お願い……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5274.ko: <voice 00296_00005274><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 훌쩍훌쩍. 제발 부탁할게…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5274.zh-Hans: <voice 00296_00005274><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>呜呜，求你了啊……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5274.zh-Hant: <voice 00296_00005274><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>嗚嗚，求求你……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000943.en:
<voice 00195_19000943><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Thanks to you, I've made it this far without being
attacked by monsters!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000943.ja:
<voice 00195_19000943><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「あなたのおかげで　ネコの魔物に
　ジャマされることもなく　ここまで来れました！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000943.ko:
<voice 00195_19000943><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 덕분에 고양이 마물에게 방해받지 않고
　여기까지 올 수 있었습니다!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000943.zh-Hans:
<voice 00195_19000943><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>多亏了你，
来这里的一路上都没有受到猫妖的阻碍！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000943.zh-Hant:
<voice 00195_19000943><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>多虧了你，來這裡的一路上
都沒有受到貓妖阻礙！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5277.en: <voice 00355_00005277><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Now, then... Do you see anything unusual around here...?<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5277.ja:
<voice 00355_00005277><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「さて……。この辺りには　何か
　異常な様子は　見当たらないでしょうか……。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5277.ko:
<voice 00355_00005277><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 어디 보자…….
　이 주변에 뭔가 이상은 없으려나…….<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5277.zh-Hans:
<voice 00355_00005277><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>嗯……
这一带有没有什么异常呢……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5277.zh-Hant: <voice 00355_00005277><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>好……這附近有沒有什麼異狀呢……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5278.en:
<voice 00435_00005278><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Hmm... There doesn't seem to be anything wrong with
the ruins themselves...<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5278.ja:
<voice 00435_00005278><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「ふむ……。遺跡そのものには
　異常は　なさそうに見えますねえ。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5278.ko:
<voice 00435_00005278><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 흠……. 유적 자체에는
　문제가 없어 보이는군요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5278.zh-Hans:
<voice 00435_00005278><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>嗯……看起来，
遗迹本身并没有不对劲的地方。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5278.zh-Hant:
<voice 00435_00005278><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>嗯……看起來
遺跡本身也沒有什麼異常。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5279.en:
<voice 00520_00005279><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>As expected, my assumption that something's wrong with
the Ripple Tuning Fork itself was correct.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5279.ja:
<voice 00520_00005279><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「やはり　波紋の音叉に
　何かがあったと見るのが　正しいようです。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5279.ko:
<voice 00520_00005279><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 역시 파문의 소리굽쇠에
　문제가 생겼다고 보는 게 맞겠어요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5279.zh-Hans: <voice 00520_00005279><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>果然还是波纹音叉出了状况。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5279.zh-Hant:
<voice 00520_00005279><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>果然還是該看看波紋音叉
發生了什麼才對。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5280.en: <voice 00607_00005280><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Allow me to explain!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5280.ja: <voice 00607_00005280><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「説明しましょう！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5280.ko: <voice 00607_00005280><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 설명해 드리죠!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5280.zh-Hans: <voice 00607_00005280><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>我来说明一下！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5280.zh-Hant: <voice 00607_00005280><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>我來說明一下！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5281.en:
<voice 00670_00005281><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>In the depths of these ruins, an important item called
the Ripple Tuning Fork is housed!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5281.ja:
<voice 00670_00005281><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「この遺跡の奥には　波紋の音叉と呼ばれる
　大切なものが　納められているのです！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5281.ko:
<voice 00670_00005281><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 이 유적 안쪽에는 파문의 소리굽쇠라는
　중요한 물건이 보관되어 있답니다!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5281.zh-Hans:
<voice 00670_00005281><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>这遗迹的深处，
有个叫波纹音叉的重要装置！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5281.zh-Hant:
<voice 00670_00005281><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>這個遺跡藏著
叫做波紋音叉的寶物！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5282.en:
<voice 00720_00005282><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Have you heard of the Song of Grace sung by Diore,
the Queen of Verinard?<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5282.ja:
<voice 00720_00005282><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「ヴェリナードの女王　ディオーレさまが唄う
　恵みの歌のことは　ご存知ですか？<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5282.ko:
<voice 00720_00005282><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 베리나드의 여왕이신 디오레 님이
　부르시는 은혜의 노래는 아십니까?<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5282.zh-Hans:
<voice 00720_00005282><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>你知不知道威里纳德女王
蒂奥蕾陛下所唱的恩惠之歌呢？<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5282.zh-Hant:
<voice 00720_00005282><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>你知道威里納德的女王，
蒂奧蕾陛下唱的恩惠之歌嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5283.en:
<voice 00750_00005283><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>The Queen's Song of Grace will purify the waters and
grant protection to every living creature in the sea!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5283.ja:
<voice 00750_00005283><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「女王さまの恵みの歌によって　水は清められ
　この海の　すべての生きとし生けるものに
　守りの加護が　与えられるのです！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5283.ko:
<voice 00750_00005283><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 여왕님이 부르시는 은혜의 노래가
　물을 정화하고 이 바다의 모든 생명체에게
　수호의 가호를 내리는 거랍니다!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5283.zh-Hans:
<voice 00750_00005283><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>女王陛下通过恩惠之歌使水净化。
这片大海中的一切生灵因此而受到加护。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5283.zh-Hant:
<voice 00750_00005283><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>女王陛下的恩惠之歌可以讓水變得清澈，
給予這片海域所有生物
守護的加持！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5284.en:
<voice 00780_00005284><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>And the Ripple Tuning Fork plays a vital role in
carrying that Song of Grace throughout the archipelago!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5284.ja:
<voice 00780_00005284><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「そして　波紋の音叉は　その恵みの歌を
　諸島全体へと伝えるという　重大な役目を
　果たしているのですよ！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5284.ko:
<voice 00780_00005284><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 그리고 파문의 소리굽쇠는
　그 은혜의 노래를 제도 전체로 퍼뜨리는
　중요한 역할을 맡고 있죠!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5284.zh-Hans:
<voice 00780_00005284><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>波纹音叉有个重要作用，
就是将恩惠之歌送到群岛的每一个角落！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5284.zh-Hant:
<voice 00780_00005284><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>波紋音叉就是將恩惠之歌
傳達到群島的
重要物品！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5285.en:
<voice 00835_00005285><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>What will happen to the Wena Islands if the blessings
of the Song of Grace are lost...?<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5285.ja:
<voice 00835_00005285><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「恵みの歌の恩恵が　なくなれば
　ウェナ諸島に　何が起こるか……。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5285.ko:
<voice 00835_00005285><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 은혜의 노래의 효과가 사라지면
　웨나 제도에 무슨 일이 생길지…….<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5285.zh-Hans:
<voice 00835_00005285><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>没有这恩惠之歌的话，
维纳群岛不知会发生什么事情……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5285.zh-Hant:
<voice 00835_00005285><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>沒有恩惠之歌的恩惠，
維納群島會發生什麼……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5286.en: <voice 00880_00005286><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Something's wrong. We need to go further in!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5286.ja:
<voice 00880_00005286><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「こうしては　いられません。
　すぐに　奥へと向かいましょう！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5286.ko:
<voice 00880_00005286><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 이러고 있을 때가 아니에요.
　어서 안쪽으로 가죠!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5286.zh-Hans:
<voice 00880_00005286><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>不能再耽误了。
我们赶快到里面去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5286.zh-Hant:
<voice 00880_00005286><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>不能這樣下去，
我們盡快前往深處吧！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5307.en: <voice 00000_00005307><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Oh, great work, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5307.ja: <voice 00000_00005307><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「おお　さすが　<pc>さんだ！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5307.ko: <voice 00000_00005307><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 오오, 역시 <pc> 씨시네요!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5307.zh-Hans: <voice 00000_00005307><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>啊，不愧是<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5307.zh-Hant: <voice 00000_00005307><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>喔喔，真不愧是<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000944.en:
<voice 00001_19000944><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>With this, we can repair the tuning fork quickly. Now
let's return to the tuning fork right away.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000944.ja:
<voice 00001_19000944><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「これがあれば　すぐにでも
　音叉を　修理できます。
　さあ　早く　波紋の音叉の所まで戻りましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000944.ko:
<voice 00001_19000944><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 이게 있으면 당장이라도
　소리굽쇠를 수리할 수 있어요.
　자, 어서 파문의 소리굽쇠로 돌아가죠.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000944.zh-Hans:
<voice 00001_19000944><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>只要有了这个，立刻就能修理音叉。
我们赶快回到波纹音叉的所在地吧。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000944.zh-Hant:
<voice 00001_19000944><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>只要有了這個，
立刻就能修理音叉。
我們趕快回到波紋音叉的所在地吧。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5288.en: <voice 00285_00005288><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>We finally made it to the Ripple Tuning Fork.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5288.ja:
<voice 00285_00005288><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「やっと　波紋の音叉の所まで
　来ることが　できましたね。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5288.ko:
<voice 00285_00005288><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 겨우 파문의 소리굽쇠가 있는 곳에
　도착했군요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5288.zh-Hans: <voice 00285_00005288><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>终于来到波纹音叉的所在地了！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5288.zh-Hant:
<voice 00285_00005288><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>終於來到
波紋音叉的所在之處了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5289.en: <voice 00445_00005289><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Nothing about it looks particularly unusual, but...<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5289.ja:
<voice 00445_00005289><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「波紋の音叉の　見た目は
　特に　異常ないようですが……。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5289.ko:
<voice 00445_00005289><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 겉보기에는 파문의 소리굽쇠에
　특별한 이상은 없어 보입니다만…….<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5289.zh-Hans: <voice 00445_00005289><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>波纹音叉看上去并没有什么异常啊……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5289.zh-Hant:
<voice 00445_00005289><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>波紋音叉看起來
好像沒什麼異常……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5290.en: <voice 00580_00005290><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Hmm, that's not good!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5290.ja: <voice 00580_00005290><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「むむっ　これは　いけません！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5290.ko: <voice 00580_00005290><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 헉, 이럴 수가!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5290.zh-Hans: <voice 00580_00005290><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>啊啊，麻烦了！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5290.zh-Hant: <voice 00580_00005290><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>唔……這樣不行！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5291.en: <voice 00720_00005291><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Oh no! The tuning fork has completely stopped!!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5291.ja:
<voice 00720_00005291><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「大変だ！　音叉の機能が
　完全に　止まってしまった！！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5291.ko:
<voice 00720_00005291><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 큰일입니다! 소리굽쇠의 기능이
　완전히 멈췄어요!!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5291.zh-Hans:
<voice 00720_00005291><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>糟糕了！
音叉的功能完全停止了！！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5291.zh-Hant:
<voice 00720_00005291><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>糟了！音叉的功能
完全停止了！！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5292.en: <voice 00860_00005292><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Mmmmm... Okay, I know what caused the malfunction.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5292.ja:
<voice 00860_00005292><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「むむむむむ……。
　故障の原因は　わかりました。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5292.ko:
<voice 00860_00005292><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 으으음…….
　고장 난 이유를 알았어요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5292.zh-Hans:
<voice 00860_00005292><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>嗯……
我知道故障的原因了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5292.zh-Hant:
<voice 00860_00005292><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>呣呣呣呣呣……
我知道故障的原因了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5293.en: <voice 01115_00005293><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Allow me to explain!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5293.ja: <voice 01115_00005293><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「説明しましょう！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5293.ko: <voice 01115_00005293><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 설명해 드리죠!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5293.zh-Hans: <voice 01115_00005293><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>我来说明一下！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5293.zh-Hant: <voice 01115_00005293><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>我來說明一下！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5294.en:
<voice 01205_00005294><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>It seems that the Crystal Fang, the component that
amplifies sound waves, has deteriorated.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5294.ja:
<voice 01205_00005294><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「音による振動波を　増幅させる部品の
　結晶牙が　劣化してしまったようです。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5294.ko:
<voice 01205_00005294><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 소리의 진동파를 증폭시키는 부품인
　결정 송곳니가 노후화된 것 같습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5294.zh-Hans:
<voice 01205_00005294><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>使声音的振动波增幅的零件，
也就是结晶牙似乎老化了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5294.zh-Hant:
<voice 01205_00005294><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>讓聲音產生的震動波增幅的
結晶牙似乎劣化了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5295.en:
<voice 01235_00005295><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>I brought some Crystal Fangs with me for just such an
occasion, but one of them seems to be missing.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5295.ja:
<voice 01235_00005295><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「こんなこともあろうかと　いくつかは
　結晶牙を持ってきていますが
　１本だけ　足りないようですね。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5295.ko:
<voice 01235_00005295><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 혹시 몰라서 결정 송곳니를
　몇 개 챙겨오긴 했습니다만
　딱 1개가 부족하네요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5295.zh-Hans:
<voice 01235_00005295><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>我早就预料到会出现这种情况，
所以事先预备了几颗结晶牙，
但还是差了１颗。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5295.zh-Hant:
<voice 01235_00005295><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>我早就想到會有這種事，
準備了幾個結晶牙來，
但看來還少１個。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5296.en:
<voice 01265_00005296><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>But worry not. Fortunately, Crystal Fangs can be found
in these very ruins.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5296.ja:
<voice 01265_00005296><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「でも　ご安心ください。
　結晶牙は　幸いにも
　この遺跡の中で　得られるものなのです。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5296.ko:
<voice 01265_00005296><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 하지만 걱정하실 것 없습니다.
　다행히 결정 송곳니는
　이 유적 안에서 구할 수 있거든요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5296.zh-Hans:
<voice 01265_00005296><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>不过庆幸的是，
结晶牙是能够在遗迹里面找到的物品。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5296.zh-Hant:
<voice 01265_00005296><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>不過，請放心。
幸好結晶牙是可以
在遺跡中取得的東西。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000945.en:
<voice 01325_19000945><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>...So, <pc>. Would you mind going back and
getting me one of those Crystal Fangs?<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000945.ja:
<voice 01325_19000945><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「……というわけで　<pc>さん。
　すみませんが　ちょっと戻って
　結晶牙を１本　手に入れましょう！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000945.ko:
<voice 01325_19000945><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: ……그래서 말인데요, <pc> 씨.
　죄송하지만 잠깐 돌아가서
　결정 송곳니 1개를 구해 옵시다!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000945.zh-Hans:
<voice 01325_19000945><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>因此……我想请求<pc>你帮个忙，
去弄１颗结晶牙来吧！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000945.zh-Hant:
<voice 01325_19000945><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>……因此，<pc>，
不好意思，請你回去一趟，
取得１顆結晶牙吧！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5298.en:
<voice 01355_00005298><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Crystal Fangs are often dropped by the Death Maestros
that appear in these ruins.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5298.ja:
<voice 01355_00005298><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「結晶牙は　この遺跡に出現する
　デスマエストロを倒すと　よく落としますから。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5298.ko:
<voice 01355_00005298><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 결정 송곳니는 이 유적에 나타나는
　데스 마에스트로를 쓰러뜨리면
　구할 수 있을 거예요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5298.zh-Hans:
<voice 01355_00005298><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>打倒出现在遗迹中的死亡乐师后，
就有很高的几率掉落结晶牙。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5298.zh-Hant:
<voice 01355_00005298><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>只要打倒在遺跡出現的死亡樂師，
就有很高的機率掉落結晶牙。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000946.en:
<voice 00705_19000946><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Crystal Fangs are often dropped by the Death Maestros
that appear in these ruins. Let's try to find one!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000946.ja:
<voice 00705_19000946><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「結晶牙は　この遺跡に出現する
　デスマエストロを倒すと　よく落とします。
　もう一度　回ってきましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000946.ko:
<voice 00705_19000946><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 결정 송곳니는 이 유적에 나타나는
　데스 마에스트로를 쓰러뜨리면 구할 수
　있을 거예요. 다시 한번 돌아보죠.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000946.zh-Hans:
<voice 00705_19000946><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>打倒出现在遗迹中的死亡乐师后，
就有很高的几率掉落结晶牙。
再到处转转吧。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000946.zh-Hant:
<voice 00705_19000946><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>打倒出現在遺跡中的死亡樂師
就有很高的機率掉落結晶牙。
再到處繞一下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000947.en: <voice 00795_19000947><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>We don't have much time. We must find it at all costs...<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000947.ja:
<voice 00795_19000947><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「あまり　時間が　ないのです。
　なんとしても　間に合わせなくては……。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000947.ko:
<voice 00795_19000947><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 시간이 별로 없습니다.
　너무 늦으면 안 되는데…….<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000947.zh-Hans:
<voice 00795_19000947><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>剩下的时间不多了，
必须要抓紧时间……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000947.zh-Hant:
<voice 00795_19000947><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>沒什麼時間了。
無論如何都得設法趕上才行……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000948.en:
<voice 00825_19000948><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Now, please go kill some Death Maestros that live in
these ruins and retrieve a Crystal Fang!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000948.ja:
<voice 00825_19000948><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「すぐに　この遺跡に出現する
　デスマエストロを　やっつけて
　結晶牙を１本　手に入れてきてください！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000948.ko:
<voice 00825_19000948><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 어서 이 유적에 나타나는
　데스 마에스트로를 해치워서
　결정 송곳니 1개를 구해 오세요!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000948.zh-Hans:
<voice 00825_19000948><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>请立刻打倒
出现在遗迹中的死亡乐师，
取得１颗结晶牙吧！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000948.zh-Hant:
<voice 00825_19000948><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>請立刻打倒
出現在這遺跡中的死亡樂師，
取得１顆結晶牙回來吧！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000949.en:
<voice 00826_19000949><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Thanks to you we were able to get a Crystal Fang
safely. I'll begin the repairs immediately.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000949.ja:
<voice 00826_19000949><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「<pc>さんのおかげで
　無事　結晶牙を手に入れることが　できました。
　私は　さっそく　修理にとりかかります。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000949.ko:
<voice 00826_19000949><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨 덕분에
　무사히 결정 송곳니를 구했네요.
　저는 당장 수리를 시작하겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000949.zh-Hans:
<voice 00826_19000949><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>多亏了<pc>，
顺利取得结晶牙了。
我立刻开始修理。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000949.zh-Hant:
<voice 00826_19000949><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>多虧了<pc>，
順利取得結晶牙了。
我立刻開始修理。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000950.en:
<voice 00960_19000950><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>I'll be busy during the repairs, so let me give you a
brief description of this site now.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000950.ja:
<voice 00960_19000950><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「修理の間　おヒマでしょうから
　この遺跡のあらましでも　説明しましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000950.ko:
<voice 00960_19000950><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 수리하는 동안 심심하실 테니
　이 유적에 대해 대략적으로 설명해 드리죠.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000950.zh-Hans:
<voice 00960_19000950><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>反正等我的时候你也闲着没事，
我就给你讲讲这座遗迹背后的故事吧。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000950.zh-Hant:
<voice 00960_19000950><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>反正等我的時候你也閒著沒事，
我就給你講講這座遺跡背後的故事吧。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000951.en:
<voice 00990_19000951><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>These ruins are said to have been built by Ladis, the
17th king of Verinard, and served as a temple.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000951.ja:
<voice 00990_19000951><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「この遺跡は　１７代前のヴェリナード国王
　ラーディスが造ったと　言われており
　神殿としての役割を　持っていたようです。　<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000951.ko:
<voice 00990_19000951><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 이 유적은 17대 전의 베리나드 국왕
　라디스가 만들었다고 알려진 곳인데
　신전의 역할을 했다더군요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000951.zh-Hans:
<voice 00990_19000951><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>这座遗迹兴建于距今１７代前的
威里纳德国王拉迪斯的时代，
是作为神殿而被建造的。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000951.zh-Hant:
<voice 00990_19000951><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>據說這座遺跡興建於距今１７代前的
威里納德國王拉迪斯的時代，
似乎具有神殿的用途。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000952.en:
<voice 01020_19000952><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>It's said that King Ladis gave up his throne to his
wife and devoted his life to building this temple.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000952.ja:
<voice 01020_19000952><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「ラーディス王は　王位を妻にゆずり
　その一生を　この神殿の建造に捧げたと
　伝えられていましてねえ。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000952.ko:
<voice 01020_19000952><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 라디스 왕은 왕위를 아내에게 물려주고
　이 신전을 짓는 데 평생을 바쳤다고
　전해지고 있는데요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000952.zh-Hans:
<voice 01020_19000952><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>拉迪斯王将王位让给了自己的妻子，
耗尽了自己一生的时光
建造了这座神殿。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000952.zh-Hant:
<voice 01020_19000952><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>傳說拉迪斯王將王位讓給妻子，
耗盡自己一生的時光
建造了這座神殿。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000953.en:
<voice 01050_19000953><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Apparently the temple was built in a place like this on
purpose to protect the Ripple Tuning Fork, but...<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000953.ja:
<voice 01050_19000953><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「波紋の音叉を守るため　あえて　このような所に
　神殿を造ったということなのですが……。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000953.ko:
<voice 01050_19000953><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 파문의 소리굽쇠를 지키기 위해 일부러
　이런 곳에 신전을 지었다고 하지만…….<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000953.zh-Hans:
<voice 01050_19000953><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>据说在这种地方建造神殿，
正是为了保护波纹音叉……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000953.zh-Hant:
<voice 01050_19000953><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>據說是為了保護波紋音叉，
才會挑在這種地方建造神殿……<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000954.en:
<voice 01111_19000954><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>I suspect... that there was some other, greater
purpose behind it.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000954.ja:
<voice 01111_19000954><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「何か　他の……大きな目的が
　あったのではないかと　私は推測しています。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000954.ko:
<voice 01111_19000954><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 뭔가 다른…… 큰 목적이 있지는
　않았을까 하는 게 제 추측이랍니다.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000954.zh-Hans:
<voice 01111_19000954><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>我推测这背后……
或许还有其他的目的。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000954.zh-Hant:
<voice 01111_19000954><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>但是就我的推測來看……
這背後應該還有其他更大的目的。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000955.en:
<voice 01141_19000955><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>The fact that every ruler following King Ladis has been
a woman... That may have something to do this.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000955.ja:
<voice 01141_19000955><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「ラーディス王を最後に　ヴェリナードの王は
　女性が　務めるようになったのですが……
　それとも　何か関係があるのかもしれません。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000955.ko:
<voice 01141_19000955><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 라디스 왕을 끝으로 베리나드의 왕위에는
　여성이 즉위하게 되었는데……
　그 일과도 무슨 관련이 있을지도 모르죠.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000955.zh-Hans:
<voice 01141_19000955><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>拉迪斯王是最后一位男性国王，
从那以后，威里纳德国王就只由女性接任……
说不定这之间也有着什么联系呢。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000955.zh-Hant:
<voice 01141_19000955><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>拉迪斯王是最後一位男性國王，
從那以後，威里納德國王都是由女性接任……
這或許有著什麼關聯吧。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000956.en: <voice 01276_19000956><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Aaaaaand... All done.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000956.ja: <voice 01276_19000956><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「これで……よし。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000956.ko: <voice 01276_19000956><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 이제…… 됐다.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000956.zh-Hans: <voice 01276_19000956><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>嗯，搞定了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000956.zh-Hant: <voice 01276_19000956><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>這樣就……好了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000957.en:
<voice 01436_19000957><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Thanks for your patience, <pc>. The repairs
were completed without incident.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000957.ja:
<voice 01436_19000957><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「お待たせしました　<pc>さん。
　修理は　無事に終わりましたよ。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000957.ko:
<voice 01436_19000957><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 기다리시게 해서 죄송해요, <pc> 씨.
　수리는 무사히 끝났습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000957.zh-Hans:
<voice 01436_19000957><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>让你久等了，<pc>。
修理顺利完成了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000957.zh-Hant:
<voice 01436_19000957><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>讓你久等了，<pc>。
順利完成修理了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000958.en:
<voice 01531_19000958><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Ooh, I'm just in time. Seems that Queen Diore has begun
to sing the Song of Grace!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000958.ja:
<voice 01531_19000958><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「おお　ギリギリで　間に合いました。
　女王ディオーレさまが　恵みの歌を
　唄いはじめたようですよ！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000958.ko:
<voice 01531_19000958><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 오오, 아슬아슬하게 시간에 맞췄네요.
　디오레 여왕님이 은혜의 노래를
　부르기 시작하신 모양입니다!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000958.zh-Hans:
<voice 01531_19000958><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>啊，勉强算是赶上了。
蒂奥蕾女王陛下已经开始歌唱恩惠之歌了！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000958.zh-Hant:
<voice 01531_19000958><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>喔喔，勉強算是趕上了。
蒂奧蕾女王似乎已經開始
唱起恩惠之歌了！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000959.en:
<voice 01706_19000959><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Would you look at that! With the power of the Song of
Grace, holy protection is being given to the surrounding
seawater.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000959.ja:
<voice 01706_19000959><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「ほら　見てください！
　恵みの歌のチカラで　周りの海水に
　聖なる守りが　与えられていきます。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000959.ko:
<voice 01706_19000959><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 자, 보세요!
　은혜의 노래의 힘으로 주위 바닷물에
　신성한 가호가 깃들고 있어요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000959.zh-Hans:
<voice 01706_19000959><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>你来看看！
恩惠之歌的力量赋予了
周围的海水神圣的力量。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000959.zh-Hant:
<voice 01706_19000959><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>你來看看！
恩惠之歌的力量賦予了
周圍的海水神聖守護。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000960.en:
<voice 01736_19000960><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>With this, the waters of the Wena Islands won't be
rough, and we'll be blessed with plentiful food from
the sea.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000960.ja:
<voice 01736_19000960><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「これで　ウェナ諸島の海は　荒れることもなく
　海の幸にも　恵まれるのです。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000960.ko:
<voice 01736_19000960><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 이제 웨나 제도의 바다는 잔잔해지고
　해산물도 풍부해질 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000960.zh-Hans:
<voice 01736_19000960><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>这样一来，维纳群岛的大海就会风平浪静。
海中的生物也会受到惠泽。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000960.zh-Hant:
<voice 01736_19000960><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>這樣一來，維納群島的大海就會風平浪靜，
我們也能捕撈到海產。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000961.en:
<voice 01791_19000961><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Phew... I'm glad the repair went well. That's a weight
off my shoulders.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000961.ja:
<voice 01791_19000961><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「ふう……。修理が　うまくいって
　私も　やっと肩の荷が降りましたよ。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000961.ko:
<voice 01791_19000961><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 휴우……. 수리가 잘 끝나서
　저도 이제야 어깨가 가벼워지네요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000961.zh-Hans:
<voice 01791_19000961><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>嗯，修理顺利地完成了，
我也终于可以放下肩上的重担了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000961.zh-Hant:
<voice 01791_19000961><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>呼……順利完成修理，
我也總算卸下肩上重擔了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000962.en: <voice 01880_19000962><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>This is all thanks to you... Thank you so much!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000962.ja:
<voice 01880_19000962><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「これもすべて　あなたのおかげです。
　本当に　ありがとうございました！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000962.ko:
<voice 01880_19000962><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 전부 당신 덕분입니다.
　정말 감사합니다!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000962.zh-Hans:
<voice 01880_19000962><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>这可全是托了你的福。
真是太谢谢了！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000962.zh-Hant:
<voice 01880_19000962><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>這可全是托了你的福。
真是太謝謝了！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5325.en: <voice 00090_00005325><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Oh, welcome back, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5325.ja: <voice 00090_00005325><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「おお　おかえり　<pc>君。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5325.ko: <voice 00090_00005325><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 오오. 어서 오게, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5325.zh-Hans: <voice 00090_00005325><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>啊，你回来了，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5325.zh-Hant: <voice 00090_00005325><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>喔喔，歡迎回來，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5326.en: <if_woman><voice 00130_00005326><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Rather, Ms. <pc>. I'm so glad you're here!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH><else><voice 00130_00005326><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>Rather, Mr. <pc>. I'm so glad you're here!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH><endif>
5326.ja:
<voice 00130_00005326><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「いやあ　<pc>さん。
　あなたがいてくれて　本当に助かりました！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5326.ko:
<voice 00130_00005326><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 이야~ <pc> 씨가
　계셔서 정말 다행이었어요!<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5326.zh-Hans:
<voice 00130_00005326><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>呀，<pc>。
这次你可帮了大忙呢！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5326.zh-Hant:
<voice 00130_00005326><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>哎呀，<pc>。
多虧你在，真是幫大忙了！<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5327.en:
<voice 00160_00005327><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>I have to return to Verinard Castle as quickly as
possible since I have another investigation to conduct.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5327.ja:
<voice 00160_00005327><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「私は　別の調査が待っているので
　急いで　ヴェリナード城へ帰らねばなりません。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5327.ko:
<voice 00160_00005327><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 전 다른 조사 때문에
　바로 베리나드성으로 돌아가야 해서요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5327.zh-Hans:
<voice 00160_00005327><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>我还有别的调查要做，
必须快点回威里纳德城去。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5327.zh-Hant:
<voice 00160_00005327><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>我還有其他調查要去做，
必須盡快回威里納德城了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5328.en:
<voice 00190_00005328><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>I've left my thank you gift with the mayor. Now, if
you'll excuse me.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5328.ja:
<voice 00190_00005328><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>「お礼は　町長さんに　あずけておきました。
　では　これにて失礼します。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5328.ko:
<voice 00190_00005328><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>: 사례금은 촌장님께 맡겨 뒀습니다.
　그럼 이만 실례할게요.<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5328.zh-Hans:
<voice 00190_00005328><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>谢礼我放在镇长那里了。
那我就先告辞了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5328.zh-Hant:
<voice 00190_00005328><start_lip_sync n00413 _normal m00001>謝禮我交給鎮長了。
那我先失陪了。<stop_lip_animation n00413 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000963.ja:
キンナーが
パーティから　外れた。

5329.en:
<voice 00392_00005329><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Well then, please take this as thanks. I've added a
little extra for you.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5329.ja:
<voice 00392_00005329><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「では　君に礼を渡そう。
　私からの分も　上乗せしておいたぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5329.ko:
<voice 00392_00005329><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 그럼 사례금을 주지.
　내 사례도 함께 넣어 두었네.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5329.zh-Hans:
<voice 00392_00005329><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>来，这是给你的谢礼。
我的那一份也在里面了。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5329.zh-Hant:
<voice 00392_00005329><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>那麼，這是謝禮。
我要給你的也一起放在裡面了。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5330.ja:
<pc>は
１０００ゴールドを　受け取った！<se_nots System Item>

5331.en: <voice 00496_00005331><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Hmm... You don't seem pleased... Is that not enough?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5331.ja:
<voice 00496_00005331><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「む……。不満そうな顔だな。
　それでは　足りないというのか？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5331.ko:
<voice 00496_00005331><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 응……? 불만스러워 보이는군.
　그걸로는 부족하단 건가?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5331.zh-Hans:
<voice 00496_00005331><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>嗯……你怎么一脸的不满啊。
难道你嫌少吗？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5331.zh-Hant:
<voice 00496_00005331><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>唔……你看起來不太滿意。
是這樣不夠的意思嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5332.en: <voice 00556_00005332><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>...Hmm, I see. So you wanted a Key Emblem.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5332.ja:
<voice 00556_00005332><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「……ふむ　そうか。
　君は　キーエンブレムが　ほしかったのか。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5332.ko:
<voice 00556_00005332><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: ……흠, 그래.
　자네는 키 엠블럼을 받고 싶었단 말이지?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5332.zh-Hans:
<voice 00556_00005332><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>哦……原来是这样。
你想要的是键徽啊。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5332.zh-Hant:
<voice 00556_00005332><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>……嗯，是嗎？
你想要鑰徽啊。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5333.en:
<voice 00586_00005333><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>However, even though I'm the mayor, I can't give you
a Key Emblem for something small like this.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5333.ja:
<voice 00586_00005333><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「だが　いくら　町長である私の頼みとはいえ
　人の手助けをした程度で
　キーエンブレムを与えることは　できん。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5333.ko:
<voice 00586_00005333><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 하지만 촌장인 내 부탁이었다고 해도
　기껏해야 사람을 도운 정도로는
　키 엠블럼을 줄 수 없네.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5333.zh-Hans:
<voice 00586_00005333><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>就算是我这个镇长委托了你，
也不能因为你帮了个忙就把键徽交给你。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5333.zh-Hant:
<voice 00586_00005333><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>不過就算是我這個鎮長的委託，
只幫人跑腿而已，
我是不會給鑰徽的。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5334.en:
<voice 00616_00005334><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>I'd be willing to consider it if you did something big
enough to save a whole town.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5334.ja:
<voice 00616_00005334><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「町ひとつを　丸ごと救うくらいの大仕事を
　やってくれたのなら　考えてもいいのだがね。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5334.ko:
<voice 00616_00005334><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 마을 전체를 구하는 수준의
　위대한 공적을 세운다면
　고려해 보겠지만 말이야.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5334.zh-Hans:
<voice 00616_00005334><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>不过要是你能做一些类似拯救全镇的大事，
那就另当别论了。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5334.zh-Hant:
<voice 00616_00005334><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>你要是做了件拯救整個市鎮的大事，
也許我可以考慮。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5335.ja: <voice 00681_00005335><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「さて　では……<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5335.ko: <voice 00681_00005335><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 그럼 이만……<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5336.en: <voice 00781_00005336><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>What's going on!?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5336.ja: <voice 00781_00005336><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「なにごとだ！？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5336.ko: <voice 00781_00005336><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 무슨 일이지!?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5336.zh-Hans: <voice 00781_00005336><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>出什么事了？！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5337.en: <voice 00922_00005337><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>W-we have a problem, Mayor!! There's a cat in town!<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5337.ja:
<voice 00922_00005337><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>「た……大変だ　町長！！
　町の中にネコが　いやがったんだ！<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5337.ko:
<voice 00922_00005337><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>: 크…… 큰일이야, 촌장님!!
　마을 안에 고양이가 있었어!<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5337.zh-Hans:
<voice 00922_00005337><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>糟……糟糕了，镇长！
在镇上发现了猫！<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5337.zh-Hant:
<voice 00922_00005337><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>糟、糟糕了……鎮長！！
在鎮上發現了貓！<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5338.en: <voice 00952_00005338><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>It's Somya! She's got a cat!!<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5338.ja: <voice 00952_00005338><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>「ソーミャだ！　あいつがネコを！！<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5338.ko: <voice 00952_00005338><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>: 소먀야! 그 녀석이 고양이를……!!<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5338.zh-Hans: <voice 00952_00005338><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>是索米娅！是那家伙干的！<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5338.zh-Hant: <voice 00952_00005338><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>是莎米亞！是她把貓帶來的！！<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5339.en: <voice 00996_00005339><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>What!? What's Somya got to do with the cats?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5339.ja:
<voice 00996_00005339><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「なに！？　ソーミャと　ネコに
　なんの関係があるというのだ？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5339.ko:
<voice 00996_00005339><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 뭐라고!? 소먀와 고양이가
　대체 무슨 관련이 있단 건가?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5339.zh-Hans:
<voice 00996_00005339><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>什么？！
你的意思是索米娅和猫有瓜葛？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5339.zh-Hant:
<voice 00996_00005339><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>什麼！？莎米亞和貓
有什麼關係？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5340.en:
<voice 01036_00005340><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>A-anyway, please come to Somya's house. If we leave
things as is, she might be in danger!<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5340.ja:
<voice 01036_00005340><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>「と……とにかく　ソーミャの家へ来てくれ。
　ほっとくと　ソーミャも危険かもしれねえ！<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5340.ko:
<voice 01036_00005340><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>: 아…… 아무튼 소먀의 집으로 와 줘.
　이대로 두면 소먀도 위험해질지 몰라!<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5340.zh-Hans:
<voice 01036_00005340><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>反、反正，请您到索米娅家看看吧。
放着不管的话，索米娅可能也会有危险的！<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5340.zh-Hant:
<voice 01036_00005340><start_lip_sync n00459 _normal m00001>總……總之，你來莎米亞的家一趟。
要是放著不管，莎米亞可能也有危險！<stop_lip_animation n00459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5341.en: <voice 01076_00005341><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>U-understood! <pc>, you need to come too!!<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5341.ja:
<voice 01076_00005341><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「わ　わかった！　<pc>君も
　ソーミャの家まで　来てくれ！！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5341.ko:
<voice 01076_00005341><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 아, 알았네! <pc>, 자네도
　소먀의 집으로 와 주게!!<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5341.zh-Hans:
<voice 01076_00005341><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>明、明白了！
<pc>你也跟我到索米娅家去一趟吧！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5341.zh-Hant:
<voice 01076_00005341><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>我、我知道了！<pc>你也快來
莎米亞的家！！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5342.en: <voice 00030_00005342><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>What on earth is going on!?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5342.ja: <voice 00030_00005342><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「いったい　なにごとだ！？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5342.ko: <voice 00030_00005342><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 대체 무슨 일인가!?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5342.zh-Hans: <voice 00030_00005342><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>到底出了什么事？！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5342.zh-Hant: <voice 00030_00005342><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>發生什麼事了！？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5343.en:
<voice 00061_00005343><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Hey, Barcell! You don't think Somya was attacked by a
cat monster, do you?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5343.ja:
<voice 00061_00005343><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「おい　バーセル！
　まさか　ソーミャが　ネコの魔物に
　襲われたんじゃ　ないだろうな？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5343.ko:
<voice 00061_00005343><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 이봐, 바젤!
　설마 소먀가 고양이 마물에게
　공격당한 건 아니겠지?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5343.zh-Hans:
<voice 00061_00005343><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>喂，巴塞尔！
该不会是索米娅被猫妖袭击了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5343.zh-Hant:
<voice 00061_00005343><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>喂，巴塞爾！
莎米亞不會是被
貓妖襲擊了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5344.en:
<voice 00155_00005344><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>That's not it at all, mayor... Anyway, have a look
