at this.<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5344.ja:
<voice 00155_00005344><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>「ちがうんだ　町長……。
　とにかく　これを見てくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5344.ko:
<voice 00155_00005344><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>: 아냐, 촌장님…….
　우선 이걸 봐 줘.<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5344.zh-Hans:
<voice 00155_00005344><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>不，镇长……
总之您过来看看吧。<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5344.zh-Hant:
<voice 00155_00005344><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>不是的，鎮長……
你先看看這個。<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5345.en: <voice 00295_00005345><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Th-that's... A cat's... A cat monster's baby...?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5345.ja:
<voice 00295_00005345><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「こ…これは。ネコの……。
　ネコの魔物の　赤ん坊……なのか？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5345.ko:
<voice 00295_00005345><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 이… 이건, 고양이의…….
　고양이 마물의 새끼인가……?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5345.zh-Hans:
<voice 00295_00005345><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>这……这是猫的……
猫妖的幼崽……吗？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5345.zh-Hant:
<voice 00295_00005345><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>這……這是……貓的……
是貓妖的嬰兒……嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5346.ja: <voice 00360_00005346><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「ううっ……。ひっくひっく……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5346.ko: <voice 00360_00005346><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 으흑……. 훌쩍훌쩍…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5346.zh-Hans: <voice 00360_00005346><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>呜呜……呜呜呜……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5346.zh-Hant: <voice 00360_00005346><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>嗚嗚……嗚嗚嗚……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5347.en:
<voice 00500_00005347><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>...Somya, what's going on? Did you bring this thing
here!?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5347.ja:
<voice 00500_00005347><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「……ソーミャ　これは　なんだ？
　お前が　連れてきたというのか！？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5347.ko:
<voice 00500_00005347><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: ……소먀, 이게 대체 뭐냐?
　네가 데려온 거냐!?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5347.zh-Hans:
<voice 00500_00005347><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>……索米娅，这是怎么回事啊？
是你带回来的吗？！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5347.zh-Hant:
<voice 00500_00005347><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>……莎米亞，這是什麼？
是妳帶來的嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5348.en:
<voice 00695_00005348><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>My son was wounded by a cat monster... I can't believe
she brought one into our town!<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5348.ja:
<voice 00695_00005348><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>「うちの息子は　ネコの魔物に
　ケガを　させられたんだぞ。
　それを町の中に連れ込むなんて　許せねえ！<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5348.ko:
<voice 00695_00005348><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>: 우리 아들은 고양이 마물 때문에
　다쳤다고. 그런 마물을
　마을 안에 들이다니 용서 못 해!<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5348.zh-Hans:
<voice 00695_00005348><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>我的儿子都被猫妖抓伤了！
绝对不能允许把猫妖弄到镇子里来！<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5348.zh-Hant:
<voice 00695_00005348><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>我兒子可是
被貓妖抓傷了。
不能放任這種東西在市鎮裡！<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5349.en:
<voice 00770_00005349><start_lip_sync n00415 _normal m00001>Is this why there've been so many cat monsters skulking
about the town lately!?<stop_lip_animation n00415 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5349.ja:
<voice 00770_00005349><start_lip_sync n00415 _normal m00001>「このところ　町の周りに
　やたら　ネコの魔物が　うろついているのは
　これが原因だったんじゃないんですか！？<stop_lip_animation n00415 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5349.ko:
<voice 00770_00005349><start_lip_sync n00415 _normal m00001>: 최근 들어 마을 주변에
　자꾸 고양이 마물이 몰려들었던 것도
　이게 원인 아닐까요!?<stop_lip_animation n00415 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5349.zh-Hans:
<voice 00770_00005349><start_lip_sync n00415 _normal m00001>最近镇子的四周总有猫妖出没，
难道就是因为它？！<stop_lip_animation n00415 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5349.zh-Hant:
<voice 00770_00005349><start_lip_sync n00415 _normal m00001>最近市鎮附近
總有貓妖在徘徊，
就是因為這個吧！？<stop_lip_animation n00415 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5350.en:
<voice 00840_00005350><start_lip_sync n00416 _normal m00001>That has to be it! We can't just leave it here like
this!!<stop_lip_animation n00416 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5350.ja:
<voice 00840_00005350><start_lip_sync n00416 _normal m00001>「きっと　そうだよ！
　このまま　放っておけないよ！！<stop_lip_animation n00416 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5350.ko:
<voice 00840_00005350><start_lip_sync n00416 _normal m00001>: 이게 원인인 게 분명해!
　이대로 놔두면 안 돼!!<stop_lip_animation n00416 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5350.zh-Hans:
<voice 00840_00005350><start_lip_sync n00416 _normal m00001>这还用说么！
不能再这么放任不管了！<stop_lip_animation n00416 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5350.zh-Hant:
<voice 00840_00005350><start_lip_sync n00416 _normal m00001>一定是因為這樣！
不能放著不管！！<stop_lip_animation n00416 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5351.en:
<voice 00940_00005351><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>What's the matter, mayor!? Do something about this
kitten!!<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5351.ja:
<voice 00940_00005351><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>「どうした　町長！？
　このチビネコを　なんとかしてくれよ！！<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5351.ko:
<voice 00940_00005351><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>: 뭘 망설여, 촌장님!?
　당장 이 새끼 고양이를 처리해 줘!!<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5351.zh-Hans:
<voice 00940_00005351><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>镇长，您还犹豫什么？！
快把这只猫崽处理掉吧！<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5351.zh-Hant:
<voice 00940_00005351><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>怎麼了，鎮長！？
快想辦法弄走這小貓！！<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5353.en: <voice 01041_00005353><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Th-that's right. I have to do something about this.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5353.ja:
<voice 01041_00005353><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「そ……そうだな。
　なんとかせねば　なるまいな。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5353.ko:
<voice 01041_00005353><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 그…… 그래.
　이 고양이를 처리해야겠지.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5353.zh-Hans:
<voice 01041_00005353><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>是……是啊。
不处理掉恐怕不行啊。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5353.zh-Hant:
<voice 01041_00005353><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>說……說的也是，
得想想辦法才行。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5356.en: <voice 01145_00005356><start_lip_sync n00415 _normal m00001>Pull yourself together, mayor!<stop_lip_animation n00415 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5356.ja: <voice 01145_00005356><start_lip_sync n00415 _normal m00001>「町長さん　しっかりしてくださいよ！<stop_lip_animation n00415 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5356.ko: <voice 01145_00005356><start_lip_sync n00415 _normal m00001>: 촌장님, 정신 차리세요!<stop_lip_animation n00415 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5356.zh-Hans: <voice 01145_00005356><start_lip_sync n00415 _normal m00001>镇长，请果断点！<stop_lip_animation n00415 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5356.zh-Hant: <voice 01145_00005356><start_lip_sync n00415 _normal m00001>鎮長大人，你振作一點啊！<stop_lip_animation n00415 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5357.en:
<voice 01225_00005357><start_lip_sync n00416 _normal m00001>B-but... what can we do? If you mess with this kitten,
who knows what the cat monsters will do?<stop_lip_animation n00416 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5357.ja:
<voice 01225_00005357><start_lip_sync n00416 _normal m00001>「で　でもさ。どうするんだい？
　この子ネコに　手を出したりしたら
　ネコの魔物たちが　何するか　わからないよ？<stop_lip_animation n00416 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5357.ko:
<voice 01225_00005357><start_lip_sync n00416 _normal m00001>: 하, 하지만 어떡하지?
　이 아기 고양이한테 손을 댔다간
　고양이 마물들이 무슨 짓을 할지 모르잖아?<stop_lip_animation n00416 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5357.zh-Hans:
<voice 01225_00005357><start_lip_sync n00416 _normal m00001>但、但是，该怎么处理呢？
要是伤害到小猫，
猫妖们恐怕不会善罢甘休吧？<stop_lip_animation n00416 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5357.zh-Hant:
<voice 01225_00005357><start_lip_sync n00416 _normal m00001>可、可是……該怎麼辦？
要是向幼貓出手，
貓妖們不知道會做出什麼？<stop_lip_animation n00416 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5358.en:
<voice 01375_00005358><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>Th-that's none of my business. The mayor can boil it
or roast it for all I care...<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5358.ja:
<voice 01375_00005358><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>「そ　そんなのは　オレの知ったことじゃない。
　町長が　煮るなり焼くなり　好きにすれば……<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5358.ko:
<voice 01375_00005358><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>: 그, 그딴 건 내 알 바 아냐.
　굽든 삶든 촌장님 마음대로 해……<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5358.zh-Hans:
<voice 01375_00005358><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>我、我才不管。
要蒸要煮，凭镇长喜欢……<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5358.zh-Hant:
<voice 01375_00005358><start_lip_sync n00414 _normal m00001>我、我才不管。
看鎮長是要殺要剮，隨他高興……<stop_lip_animation n00414 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5359.ja: <voice 01445_00005359><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「いやあああっ！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5359.ko: <voice 01445_00005359><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 안 돼애애애!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5359.zh-Hant: <voice 01445_00005359><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>不要啊啊啊！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5361.en: <voice 01641_00005361><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Good grief... I can't watch this anymore.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5361.ja: <voice 01641_00005361><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>「やれやれ……。見ちゃいらんねえな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5361.ko: <voice 01641_00005361><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>: 나 원……. 못 봐 주겠군.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5361.zh-Hans: <voice 01641_00005361><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>哎呀……真是看不下去了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5361.zh-Hant: <voice 01641_00005361><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>哎呀呀……看不下去了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5362.en: <voice 01761_00005362><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Wh-who are you, mister?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5362.ja: <voice 01761_00005362><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「な……なんだね　君は？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5362.ko: <voice 01761_00005362><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 자…… 자네는 누군가?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5362.zh-Hans: <voice 01761_00005362><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>你、你是谁？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5362.zh-Hant: <voice 01761_00005362><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>你……你是誰？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5363.en: <voice 01865_00005363><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I'm just passing through.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5363.ja: <voice 01865_00005363><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>「ただの通りすがりさ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5363.ko: <voice 01865_00005363><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>: 그냥 지나가던 여행자야.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5363.zh-Hans: <voice 01865_00005363><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>一个过路的而已。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5363.zh-Hant: <voice 01865_00005363><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>只是個路過的而已。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5364.en:
<voice 01880_00005364><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>If you lot can't do it, I'll just throw him into the
ocean for you!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5364.ja:
<voice 01880_00005364><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>「あんたらが　できねえってんなら
　オレが代わりに　こいつを
　海に　放り込んできてやるよ！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5364.ko:
<voice 01880_00005364><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>: 당신들이 못 하겠다면
　내가 대신 바다에 버려 주지!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5364.zh-Hans:
<voice 01880_00005364><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>你们要是下不了手，
就由我当这恶人，
把这家伙丢到海里去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5364.zh-Hant:
<voice 01880_00005364><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>你們要是不敢下手，
就讓我代替你們把這傢伙
丟進海裡吧！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5365.en: <voice 02061_00005365><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>G-GIVE HIM BACK!! He's my family...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5365.ja:
<voice 02061_00005365><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「か　返して！！
　その子は　私の家族なのっ。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5365.ko:
<voice 02061_00005365><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 도, 돌려줘!!
　그 아이는 내 가족이란 말이야.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5365.zh-Hans:
<voice 02061_00005365><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>还、还给我！！
这小家伙是我的家人。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5365.zh-Hant:
<voice 02061_00005365><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>還、還給我！！
牠是我的家人。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5366.en: <voice 02120_00005366><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Huh? Family? That's a stupid thing to say, isn't it.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5366.ja:
<voice 02120_00005366><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>「はあ？　家族だ？
　バカ言ってんじゃねえよ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5366.ko:
<voice 02120_00005366><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>: 뭐? 가족?
　웃기는 소리 하지 마.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5366.zh-Hans:
<voice 02120_00005366><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>啊？家人？
别说傻话了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5366.zh-Hant:
<voice 02120_00005366><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>什麼？家人？
別說笑了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5367.en: <voice 02225_00005367><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Hey, wait. Are you serious?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5367.ja: <voice 02225_00005367><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「おい　待て。本気なのか？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5367.ko: <voice 02225_00005367><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 이봐, 기다려. 진심이야?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5367.zh-Hans: <voice 02225_00005367><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>喂，等一下，你真要那么做吗？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5367.zh-Hant: <voice 02225_00005367><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>等等，你是認真的？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5368.ja: <voice 02309_00005368><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pipipi_mid>「当たり前だろ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5369.en:
<voice 02350_00005369><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>L-let's talk about it at my place first! It's not too
late!!<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5369.ja:
<voice 02350_00005369><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「ま　まずは　私の家で話をしよう！
　それからでも　遅くはない！！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5369.ko:
<voice 02350_00005369><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 우, 우선 우리 집에서 이야기하지!
　그 뒤에 처리해도 늦지 않으니까!!<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5369.zh-Hans:
<voice 02350_00005369><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>总、总之先到我家谈谈吧！
在那之后再丢也不晚！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5369.zh-Hant:
<voice 02350_00005369><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>總、總之大家先來我家說吧！
在那之後再決定也不遲！！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5371.ja: <voice 02565_00005371><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「ううっ　ううっ……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5371.ko: <voice 02565_00005371><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 으흑, 흑…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5371.zh-Hans: <voice 02565_00005371><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>呜呜，呜呜……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5371.zh-Hant: <voice 02565_00005371><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>嗚嗚……嗚嗚……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5372.en: <voice 00040_00005372><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Mr. Hyuza... You said?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5372.ja: <voice 00040_00005372><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「ヒューザ君…と言ったな？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5372.ko: <voice 00040_00005372><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 휴자…라고 했지?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5372.zh-Hans: <voice 00040_00005372><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>修萨……你是叫这个名字吧？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5372.zh-Hant: <voice 00040_00005372><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>你叫修扎……對吧？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5373.en:
<voice 00160_00005373><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Would you please reconsider dumping that kitten into
the ocean?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5373.ja:
<voice 00160_00005373><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「その子ネコを　海に捨てるというのは
　考えなおしてもらえんか？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5373.ko:
<voice 00160_00005373><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 그 아기 고양이를 바다에 버리는 건
　다시 생각해 보지 않겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5373.zh-Hans:
<voice 00160_00005373><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>关于把小猫丢入大海的事，
可不可以请你重新考虑一下呢？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5373.zh-Hant:
<voice 00160_00005373><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>你能不能別
把那隻幼貓丟進海裡？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5374.en: <voice 00200_00005374><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You want me to give it back to the kid?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5374.ja: <voice 00200_00005374><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「あのガキに　返せとでも言うのか？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5374.ko: <voice 00200_00005374><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 그 꼬마한테 돌려주란 거야?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5374.zh-Hans: <voice 00200_00005374><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>难道你要让我把它还给那个小鬼吗？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5374.zh-Hant: <voice 00200_00005374><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你是叫我還給那小鬼嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5375.en:
<voice 00230_00005375><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Not at all. It's true that Somya doesn't have a family,
and I can't understand how she feels, but...<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5375.ja:
<voice 00230_00005375><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「いやっ　そうではない。
　確かに　ソーミャは家族がおらず
　あの子の気持ちは　わからないでもないが……。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5375.ko:
<voice 00230_00005375><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 아니, 그런 뜻은 아닐세.
　물론 소먀는 가족이 없으니
　그 아이의 마음을 모르는 건 아니지만…….<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5375.zh-Hans:
<voice 00230_00005375><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>不，并不是那样。
虽然我理解索米娅孤苦伶仃，
无依无靠的感受……<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5375.zh-Hant:
<voice 00230_00005375><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>不是，不是那樣。
莎米亞沒有家人，
我也不是不能理解她……<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5376.en:
<voice 00251_00005376><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Maybe this is why the cat monsters have been prowling
around the town. We can't just leave it here.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5376.ja:
<voice 00251_00005376><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「ネコの魔物が　辺りをうろついていたのは
　その子ネコのせいかも　しれんのだ。
　町に置いておくわけには　いかない。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5376.ko:
<voice 00251_00005376><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 고양이 마물이 이 주변을 맴도는 건
　그 아기 고양이 때문일지도 몰라.
　이대로 마을에 둘 순 없어.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5376.zh-Hans:
<voice 00251_00005376><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>但猫妖出现在镇子的周边，
可能正是那小猫造成的。
所以小猫绝对不可以再留在镇上。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5376.zh-Hant:
<voice 00251_00005376><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>但貓妖在附近徘徊，
可能是為了那隻幼貓。
我們不能留牠在鎮上。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5377.en:
<voice 00281_00005377><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>But if they found out that you dumped it in the ocean,
who knows what they'd do to me!?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5377.ja:
<voice 00281_00005377><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「しかし　そいつを　海に捨てたことが
　やつらに　知られでもしたら
　どんな報復を受けるか　わからんのだ！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5377.ko:
<voice 00281_00005377><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그 고양이를 바다에 버렸다가
　놈들이 알아차리기라도 하면
　어떤 보복을 당할지 알 수 없네!<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5377.zh-Hans:
<voice 00281_00005377><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>可是，如果他们知道
我们把幼崽丢入大海，
是绝不会善罢甘休的！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5377.zh-Hant:
<voice 00281_00005377><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>但要是把牠丟進海裡，
被那些貓妖知道了，
不知道牠們會怎麼報復我們！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5378.en: <voice 00354_00005378><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Hmm... You're here, too?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5378.ja: <voice 00354_00005378><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「む……君も来てくれたのか。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5378.ko: <voice 00354_00005378><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 아…… 자네도 왔군.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5378.zh-Hans: <voice 00354_00005378><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>唔……你也来了么。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5378.zh-Hant: <voice 00354_00005378><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>唔……你也來了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5379.en: <voice 00425_00005379><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Huh? What is it, <pc>?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5379.ja: <voice 00425_00005379><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ん？　なんだ　<pc>じゃねえか。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5379.ko: <voice 00425_00005379><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 응? 뭐야, <pc> 아냐.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5379.zh-Hans: <voice 00425_00005379><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>咦？这不是<pc>么。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5379.zh-Hant: <voice 00425_00005379><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>嗯？喔？這不是<pc>嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5380.en:
<voice 00465_00005380><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Didn't know you came to this town too. Seems we met
again sooner than expected.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5380.ja:
<voice 00465_00005380><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「お前も　この町に来てたのかよ。
　思ったよりも　早い再会だったな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5380.ko:
<voice 00465_00005380><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 너도 여기 와 있었어?
　생각보다 빨리 다시 만났군.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5380.zh-Hans:
<voice 00465_00005380><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你也来这镇子上了啊。
没想到这么快又见面了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5380.zh-Hant:
<voice 00465_00005380><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你也來這座市鎮了啊。
再次見面比我想得還早。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5381.en: <voice 00625_00005381><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>You two know each other?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5381.ja: <voice 00625_00005381><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「ふたりは　知り合いなのかね？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5381.ko: <voice 00625_00005381><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 둘이 아는 사이인가?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5381.zh-Hans: <voice 00625_00005381><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>你们两个认识么？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5381.zh-Hant: <voice 00625_00005381><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>你們兩個認識嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5382.en:
<voice 00655_00005382><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Not too long ago, me 'n <pc> fought over
the title of Shellner.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5382.ja:
<voice 00655_00005382><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「オレと　<pc>は
　シェルナーの座を　争った仲だぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5382.ko:
<voice 00655_00005382><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 나랑 {pc}|hpp(은,는)
　셸너 자리를 두고 경쟁한 라이벌이야.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5382.zh-Hans:
<voice 00655_00005382><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我和<pc>
是争夺舍纳的竞争对手。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5382.zh-Hant:
<voice 00655_00005382><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我和<pc>
可是一起爭奪傳貝護者寶座的關係。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5383.en:
<voice 00815_00005383><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Oh, I had no idea! Allow me to introduce myself once
more, then. I'm Keel's father, Vollen.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5383.ja:
<voice 00815_00005383><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「おお　そうだったのか！
　ならば　あらためて　あいさつしておこう。
　私は　キールの父親のボーレンだ。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5383.ko:
<voice 00815_00005383><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 오오, 그랬군!
　그럼 정식으로 인사하지.
　난 키르의 아비인 보렌일세.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5383.zh-Hans:
<voice 00815_00005383><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>啊，是么！
看来我最好也来重新自我介绍一下，
我是琪尔的父亲柏莲。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5383.zh-Hant:
<voice 00815_00005383><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>喔，這樣啊！
那我再自我介紹一次吧。
我是琪兒的父親波連。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5384.en: <voice 00845_00005384><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>They already know that. Keel told 'em.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5384.ja:
<voice 00845_00005384><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「そんなの　知ってるって。
　キールから　聞いたからな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5384.ko:
<voice 00845_00005384><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 그런 건 나도 알아.
　키르한테 들었으니까.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5384.zh-Hans:
<voice 00845_00005384><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>早就知道了，
琪尔提过很多次。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5384.zh-Hant:
<voice 00845_00005384><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我知道，
琪兒和我說了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5385.en: <voice 00915_00005385><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>I-is that so...?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5385.ja: <voice 00915_00005385><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「そ……そうか。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5385.ko: <voice 00915_00005385><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 그…… 그렇군.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5385.zh-Hans: <voice 00915_00005385><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>这、这样啊…………<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5386.en:
<voice 00955_00005386><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>More importantly, <pc>. Why don't you come
with me for a bit?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5386.ja:
<voice 00955_00005386><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「それよりも　<pc>。
　ちょいとオレに　付き合わねえか？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5386.ko:
<voice 00955_00005386><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 그건 그렇고, <pc>.
　잠깐 나랑 같이 가 주겠어?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5386.zh-Hans:
<voice 00955_00005386><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>话说回来<pc>。
有没有空陪我走一趟？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5386.zh-Hant:
<voice 00955_00005386><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>說起來，<pc>，
你可以跟我來一下嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5387.en: <voice 00540_00005387><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Hey, you... What's your name?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5387.ja:
<voice 00540_00005387><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「なあ　お前……。
　名前は　なんていうんだ？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5387.ko:
<voice 00540_00005387><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 이봐, 너…….
　이름이 뭐야?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5387.zh-Hans:
<voice 00540_00005387><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喂，我说……
你叫什么名字？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5387.zh-Hant:
<voice 00540_00005387><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喂，你……
名字叫什麼？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5388.en:
<voice 00570_00005388><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Hmm...<pc>, is it? You're on a journey,
aren't you?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5388.ja:
<voice 00570_00005388><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ふん……。<pc>だな？
　お前も　旅の途中なんだろ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5388.ko:
<voice 00570_00005388><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 흠……. {pc}|hpp(이라,라)고?
　너도 여행 중인 거지?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5388.zh-Hans:
<voice 00570_00005388><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>嗯……<pc>是么？
你也是旅行者么？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5388.zh-Hant:
<voice 00570_00005388><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喔……你叫<pc>啊？
你也在旅行吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5389.en:
<voice 00740_00005389><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>If you're not in a big hurry, why don't you come with
me for a bit?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5389.ja:
<voice 00740_00005389><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「たいして　急がねえんなら
　ちょいとオレに　付き合わねえか？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5389.ko:
<voice 00740_00005389><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 급한 볼일이 있는 게 아니라면
　잠깐 나랑 같이 가 주겠어?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5389.zh-Hans:
<voice 00740_00005389><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>要是不着急赶路的话，
陪我走一遭怎么样？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5389.zh-Hant:
<voice 00740_00005389><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你要是不急著趕路，
可以跟我來一下嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5390.en:
<voice 00999_00005390><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I'm thinkin' about returning this little guy to his
parents.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5390.ja: <voice 00999_00005390><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「こいつを　親元に返してやろうと思ってな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5390.ko: <voice 00999_00005390><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 이 녀석을 부모한테 돌려줄까 해서.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5390.zh-Hans: <voice 00999_00005390><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我想把这家伙送回他父母身边去。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5390.zh-Hant: <voice 00999_00005390><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我想把牠送還給牠父母。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5391.en:
<voice 01020_00005391><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>It'd be a pain to find them on my own. Want to give
me a hand?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5391.ja:
<voice 01020_00005391><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「オレひとりで探すのも　めんどくせえ。
　お前も　手伝ってくれねえか？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5391.ko:
<voice 01020_00005391><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 나 혼자 찾긴 귀찮으니
　너도 도와주지 않겠어?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5391.zh-Hans:
<voice 01020_00005391><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我一个人去找实在太麻烦了。
你来帮帮我怎么样？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5391.zh-Hant:
<voice 01020_00005391><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我一個人找太費工夫了。
你可以幫我嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000964.de: Hyuza tritt der Gruppe bei!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000964.en: Hyuza joined the party!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000964.es: ¡Hyuza se une al grupo!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000964.fr: Hyuza se joint à l'équipe!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000964.it: Hyuza si unisce al gruppo!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000964.ja:
ヒューザが
パーティに　加わった。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000964.zh-Hans:
修萨
加入了队伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000964.zh-Hant:
修扎
加入了隊伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>

5392.en: <voice 01059_00005392><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Weren't you going to dump it into the ocean?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5392.ja: <voice 01059_00005392><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「海に捨てるのでは　なかったのか？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5392.ko: <voice 01059_00005392><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 바다에 버린다고 하지 않았나?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5392.zh-Hans: <voice 01059_00005392><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>不是要丢到海里去吗？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5392.zh-Hant: <voice 01059_00005392><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>你不是要把牠丟進海裡嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5393.en:
<voice 01094_00005393><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>That'd just put the town in danger, wouldn't it?
I don't wanna have to babysit you too.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5393.ja:
<voice 01094_00005393><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　この町が　ヤバくなるんだろ？
　そっちの面倒まで見るのは　ゴメンだぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5393.ko:
<voice 01094_00005393><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 그럼 이 마을이 위험해질 거라면서?
　난 그 뒷감당까진 못 해.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5393.zh-Hans:
<voice 01094_00005393><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>那样的话，这个镇子不就惨了么？
我可没工夫收拾那样的残局。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5393.zh-Hant:
<voice 01094_00005393><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>這樣鎮上會出大事吧？
我可不想幫忙收拾爛攤子。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5394.en: <voice 01134_00005394><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>S-sorry. I appreciate it.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5394.ja: <voice 01134_00005394><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「す　すまん。恩に着る。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5394.ko: <voice 01134_00005394><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 고, 고맙다. 이 은혜는 잊지 않으마.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5394.zh-Hans: <voice 01134_00005394><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>抱、抱歉。谢谢了。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5394.zh-Hant: <voice 01134_00005394><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>抱、抱歉……我欠你一份人情。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5395.en:
<voice 01184_00005395><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Head to a place called Cat Island. It's said that the
cat monsters in this area live there in groups.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5395.ja:
<voice 01184_00005395><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「ならば　猫島という島に　向かうといい。
　そこでは　この地方のネコの魔物たちが
　集団で　暮らしているらしいのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5395.ko:
<voice 01184_00005395><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 그렇다면 고양이섬이란 섬에 가 보게.
　그곳에 이 지방의 고양이 마물들이
　모여 산다고 들었거든.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5395.zh-Hans:
<voice 01184_00005395><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>那样的话，你们就去一趟猫岛吧。
猫妖们都是结伴一起生活在那里的。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5395.zh-Hant:
<voice 01184_00005395><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>那麼，你們去貓島吧。
這個地方的貓妖
似乎在那裡群居。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5396.en:
<voice 01255_00005396><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>I heard there's an important place on the far side of
the island called the Giant Cat's Nest. If you go
there, you might find a clue.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5396.ja:
<voice 01255_00005396><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「島の奥には　巨猫の巣と呼ばれる
　特別な場所があるとも　聞いている。
　そこに行けば　手がかりが得られるかもしれん。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5396.ko:
<voice 01255_00005396><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 섬 안쪽에는 거묘의 보금자리라는
　특별한 곳이 있다고 하네.
　거기 가면 뭔가 단서를 얻을 수 있을 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5396.zh-Hans:
<voice 01255_00005396><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>岛的深处有个叫巨猫巢穴的特殊场所。
你们前去看看，说不定会发现些什么。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5396.zh-Hant:
<voice 01255_00005396><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>島的深處更有一個叫做
巨貓巢穴的特殊場所。
去那裡也許就能找到些什麼線索。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5397.en: <voice 01294_00005397><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Hmph. Better than having no plan at all. I'll go.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5397.ja:
<voice 01294_00005397><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ふん。アテがないよりは　マシだな。
　そこへ行ってみるとするか。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5397.ko:
<voice 01294_00005397><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 흥, 막연히 돌아다니는 것보단 낫겠군.
　일단 거기로 가 볼까.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5397.zh-Hans:
<voice 01294_00005397><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>哼，总比无头苍蝇似的乱撞要强。
就先去那里看看吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5397.zh-Hant:
<voice 01294_00005397><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>嗯，比起毫無頭緒亂找好點。
就去那裡看看吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5398.en: <voice 01324_00005398><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>This is an official request from me.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5398.ja: <voice 01324_00005398><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「これは正式に　私からの依頼としよう。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5398.ko: <voice 01324_00005398><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 이건 내 정식 의뢰로 삼겠네.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5398.zh-Hans: <voice 01324_00005398><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>这算是我的正式委托。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5398.zh-Hant: <voice 01324_00005398><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>我在此正式地委託你們。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5399.en:
<voice 01384_00005399><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001><pc>, if I'm not mistaken, you wanted a
Key Emblem, right?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5399.ja:
<voice 01384_00005399><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「たしか　<pc>君は
　キーエンブレムが　欲しいということだったな？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5399.ko:
<voice 01384_00005399><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 자네는
　키 엠블럼을 받고 싶다고 했지?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5399.zh-Hans:
<voice 01384_00005399><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>我记得<pc>
是想得到键徽吧？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5399.zh-Hant:
<voice 01384_00005399><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>我記得，
<pc>想要鑰徽對吧？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5400.en:
<voice 01404_00005400><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Saving the town's an important job. If you do it well,
you'll get your emblem!<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5400.ja:
<voice 01404_00005400><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「これは町を救うという　大きな仕事だ。
　うまく　やってくれたら　君たちに
　キーエンブレムを与えようではないか！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5400.ko:
<voice 01404_00005400><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 이건 마을의 생존이 달린 중요한 문제일세.
　잘 처리해 주면 자네들에게
　키 엠블럼을 주겠네!<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5400.zh-Hans:
<voice 01404_00005400><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>眼下这件就是拯救全镇的大事了。
要是能圆满解决，
键徽就是你们的了！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5400.zh-Hant:
<voice 01404_00005400><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>這是為了拯救市鎮的重要工作。
做得好的話，
我就給你們鑰徽吧！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5401.en: <voice 01499_00005401><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Alright, I think we're set. Come on, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5401.ja:
<voice 01499_00005401><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「話は決まったな。
　<pc>　付き合ってもらうぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5401.ko:
<voice 01499_00005401><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 그럼 얘기는 마무리됐군.
　<pc>, 잘 부탁한다.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5401.zh-Hans:
<voice 01499_00005401><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>就这么定了。
<pc>跟我一起去。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5401.zh-Hant:
<voice 01499_00005401><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>就這麼說好了。
<pc>，跟我來吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5402.en: <voice 01629_00005402><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Stop!! I'm going to raise him!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5402.ja:
<voice 01629_00005402><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「ダメ！！
　その子は　私が育てるの！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5402.ko:
<voice 01629_00005402><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 안 돼!!
　그 아이는 내가 키울 거야!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5402.zh-Hans:
<voice 01629_00005402><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>不行！
那小家伙是我的孩子！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5402.zh-Hant:
<voice 01629_00005402><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>不行！！
我要養牠！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5403.en: <voice 01785_00005403><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You little brat. You were eavesdropping, weren't you?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5403.ja: <voice 01785_00005403><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「このガキ。立ち聞きしてやがったな？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5403.ko: <voice 01785_00005403><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 이 꼬맹이, 우리 대화를 엿들은 거냐?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5403.zh-Hans: <voice 01785_00005403><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>麻烦的小鬼，偷听我们说话了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5403.zh-Hant: <voice 01785_00005403><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>小鬼，你偷聽了我們的對話對吧？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5404.en: <voice 01829_00005404><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>I'm his mother! So you have to give him back to me.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5404.ja:
<voice 01829_00005404><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「私が　その子の　お母さんなの！
　だから　私に返してっ。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5404.ko:
<voice 01829_00005404><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 내가 그 아이의 엄마야!
　그러니 나한테 돌려줘.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5404.zh-Hans:
<voice 01829_00005404><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我是他的妈妈！
快点把孩子还给我。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5404.zh-Hant:
<voice 01829_00005404><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我是牠媽媽！
所以還給我。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5405.en:
<voice 01899_00005405><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I don't have time for this pipsqueak. Let's go,
<pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5405.ja:
<voice 01899_00005405><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ガキに　付き合ってるヒマはねえ。
　行こうぜ　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5405.ko:
<voice 01899_00005405><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 애들 상대해 줄 시간은 없어.
　가자, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5405.zh-Hans:
<voice 01899_00005405><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我可没时间陪这小鬼玩。
走吧，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5405.zh-Hant:
<voice 01899_00005405><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我可沒空陪小鬼胡鬧。
走吧，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5406.en: <voice 02124_00005406><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Give me a break...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5406.ja: <voice 02124_00005406><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「おいおい……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5407.en: <voice 02189_00005407><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>If you have to go, take me with you!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5407.ja:
<voice 02189_00005407><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「どうしても行くんなら
　私も　連れていって！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5407.ko: <voice 02189_00005407><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 정 가야겠다면 나도 데려가!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5407.zh-Hans:
<voice 02189_00005407><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>要是你们一定要去，
就带上我！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5407.zh-Hant:
<voice 02189_00005407><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>你們執意要去的話，
就帶我一起去！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5408.en: <voice 02289_00005408><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>UGH, HOW ANNOYING! I get it, I'll take you already!!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5408.ja:
<voice 02289_00005408><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「あー　うぜえ！
　わかったよ　連れてってやるよ！！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5408.ko:
<voice 02289_00005408><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 아아~ 짜증 나 죽겠네!
　알았어, 데려가 줄게!!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5408.zh-Hans:
<voice 02289_00005408><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>唉，真烦人！
知道啦，也带上你去总可以了吧！！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5408.zh-Hant:
<voice 02289_00005408><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>啊──吵死了！
我知道了，帶上妳總行了吧！！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5409.en:
<voice 02348_00005409><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I don't want to leave her alone just for her to sneak
up on me later.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5409.ja:
<voice 02348_00005409><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ほっといて　こっそり　後から
　ついてこられたりしちゃ　かなわねえ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5409.ko:
<voice 02348_00005409><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 내버려뒀다가 몰래
　따라오기라도 하면 더 귀찮아질 테니까.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5409.zh-Hans:
<voice 02348_00005409><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>反正不带上你，
你也会偷偷跟来的吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5409.zh-Hant:
<voice 02348_00005409><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我可不想
妳到時候偷偷跟著我們。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000965.de: Somya tritt der Gruppe bei!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000965.en: Somya joined the party!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000965.es: ¡Somya se une al grupo!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000965.fr: Somya se joint à l'équipe!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000965.it: Somya si unisce al gruppo!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000965.ja:
ソーミャが
パーティに　加わった。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000965.zh-Hans:
索米娅
加入了队伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000965.zh-Hant:
莎米亞
加入了隊伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>

19001540.en:
<pc> received the kitten (Key Item) from
Hyuza!<me 60>
19001540.ja:
<pc>は　ヒューザから
子ネコ（だいじなもの）を　受け取った！　<me 60>
19001540.zh-Hans:
<pc>从修萨手中
收下了小猫（重要物品）！<me 60>
19001540.zh-Hant:
<pc>從修扎手中
收下了幼貓（重要物品）！<me 60>

5413.en: <voice 02724_00005413><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Come on, let's go. Stay close, okay?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5413.ja:
<voice 02724_00005413><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ほら　行くぞ。
　絶対に　オレから離れるなよ？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5413.ko:
<voice 02724_00005413><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 자, 가자.
　나한테서 절대 떨어지지 마, 알았지?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5413.zh-Hans:
<voice 02724_00005413><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>小鬼，走吧。
要跟紧我哦。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5413.zh-Hant:
<voice 02724_00005413><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>走吧，
絕對不能離開我們喔？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000966.en:
<voice 02781_19000966><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Ok, so we're headin' out to the Giant Cat's Nest or
whatever. Let's get goin', <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000966.ja:
<voice 02781_19000966><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　巨猫の巣とやらに
　出かけるとするか。
　行くぞ　<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000966.ko:
<voice 02781_19000966><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 자, 거묘의 보금자리인지 뭔지로
　출발해 볼까.
　가자, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000966.zh-Hans:
<voice 02781_19000966><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>那就前往那个
巨猫巢穴吧。
走啰，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000966.zh-Hant:
<voice 02781_19000966><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>那就前往那個
巨貓巢穴吧。
走囉，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5415.en:
<voice 00085_00005415><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Cat Rebelio. My son, Catrick, still hasn't been found,
has he...?<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5415.ja:
<voice 00085_00005415><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「キャット・リベリオよ。
　わらわの息子　ジュニアは
　まだ　見つからぬのかえ……。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5415.ko:
<voice 00085_00005415><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 캣 리벨리오.
　내 아들 주니어는 아직 못 찾았느냐……?<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5415.zh-Hans:
<voice 00085_00005415><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>叛逆猫，
你还没找到我的儿子修尼亚的下落么……<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5415.zh-Hant:
<voice 00085_00005415><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>叛逆貓啊，
還沒找到我的兒子
幼子貓嗎……<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5416.en: <voice 00166_00005416><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Yes... Forgive me, meow.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5416.ja: <voice 00166_00005416><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ハッ……。申し訳ありませんニャ。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5416.ko: <voice 00166_00005416><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 예……. 죄송합니다냥.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5416.zh-Hans: <voice 00166_00005416><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>是……万分抱歉喵。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5416.zh-Hant: <voice 00166_00005416><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>唉……非常抱歉喵。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5417.en:
<voice 00263_00005417><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>But we're pretty sure the Weddies are behind this.
I've had some of our people searching around the town,
but the tail's gone cold.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5417.ja:
<voice 00263_00005417><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ですが　ウェディどものしわざに決まってます。
　アヤツらの町の周りを　探らせてますが
　なかなか　シッポを　つかめませんで。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5417.ko:
<voice 00263_00005417><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 하지만 웨디 놈들의 소행일 게 뻔합니다.
　놈들 마을 주변을 샅샅이 뒤지고 있습니다만
　좀처럼 꼬리를 드러내질 않습니다.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5417.zh-Hans:
<voice 00263_00005417><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>但是这肯定是维迪们搞的鬼。
我们已经在他们居住的镇子周围搜查过了，
可是却查不出个头绪。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5417.zh-Hant:
<voice 00263_00005417><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>不過一定是維迪那幫人做的。
我找遍了他們的市鎮附近，
卻查不出個頭緒。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5418.en: <voice 00385_00005418><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Mmm!? And just who are you?<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5418.ja: <voice 00385_00005418><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「むむっ！？　何者ニャ　キサマは？<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5418.ko: <voice 00385_00005418><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 응!? 뭐냥, 네놈은?<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5418.zh-Hans: <voice 00385_00005418><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>嗯嗯？！来者何人喵？<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5418.zh-Hant: <voice 00385_00005418><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>唔唔！？來者何人喵？<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5419.en:
<voice 00420_00005419><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Don't you know that this is the room of Cat Momma,
queen of all of Cat Island!?<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5419.ja:
<voice 00420_00005419><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ここが　この猫島を治める女王
　キャット・マンマーさまの
　お部屋と知っての　ロウゼキか！？<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5419.ko:
<voice 00420_00005419><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 이곳이 고양이섬을 다스리시는 여왕
　캣 맘마 님의 방이란 걸 알고도
　이리 무엄한 짓을 하는 것이냐!?<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5419.zh-Hans:
<voice 00420_00005419><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>这里可是猫岛的女王
曼玛猫陛下的寝宫。
你是故意闯入的吗？！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5419.zh-Hant:
<voice 00420_00005419><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>這裡可是統治貓島的女王
女王貓陛下的房間，
不得無禮！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5420.en:
<voice 00549_00005420><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Queen Momma is deeply grieved at the loss of her son!
Leave now while I'm still feeling merciful, meow!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5420.ja:
<voice 00549_00005420><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「マンマーさまは今　ご子息を失って
　おおいに　心を痛めておられる！
　お慈悲のあるうちに　立ち去るがいいニャ！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5420.ko:
<voice 00549_00005420><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 맘마 님은 지금 아드님이 사라지셔서
　몹시 근심하고 계신다!
　맘마 님이 자비를 베푸실 때 썩 돌아가라냥!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5420.zh-Hans:
<voice 00549_00005420><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>曼玛陛下正在为失踪的公子担心，
没空理睬你！
识相的话就赶紧滚吧喵！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5420.zh-Hant:
<voice 00549_00005420><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>女王貓陛下現在也因痛失愛子
而萬分心痛！
趁我還能手下留情，快離開吧喵！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5422.en:
<voice 00724_00005422><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Mmm, you're one of those Weddie, aren't you? If you're
a spy, I'll wipe the floor with you, meow!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5422.ja:
<voice 00724_00005422><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「むむっ　キサマら　ウェディの連中か？
　カチコミなら　返り討ちにしてやるニャ！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5422.ko:
<voice 00724_00005422><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 응? 너희는 웨디 아니냐?
　기습하러 온 거라면 상대해 주겠다냥!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5422.zh-Hans:
<voice 00724_00005422><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>嗯嗯，你们是维迪的子民吧？
胆敢在这里撒野，小心惹火上身喵！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5422.zh-Hant:
<voice 00724_00005422><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>唔唔，你們是維迪的子民嗎？
要找碴的話，我就給你們迎頭痛擊喵！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5423.en:
<voice 00791_00005423><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Don't get your fur in a twist, fat cat. We're just
here to make a delivery.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5423.ja:
<voice 00791_00005423><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「あわてんなよ　ブタネコ。
　オレたちは　届け物に来ただけさ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5423.ko:
<voice 00791_00005423><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 흥분하지 마, 뚱땡이 고양이.
　우린 갖다 줄 게 있어서 온 것뿐이니까.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5423.zh-Hans:
<voice 00791_00005423><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>不要闹了，肥猫。
我们是来送东西的。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5423.zh-Hant:
<voice 00791_00005423><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>別那麼緊張，肥貓，
我們是來送東西的。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5424.en:
<voice 00883_00005424><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>F-Fat cat!! I'll make you the rust on my blade,
meow!!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5424.ja:
<voice 00883_00005424><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ブ……ブタネコだとおっ！！
　キサマら　オレの剣のサビにしてやるニャー！！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5424.ko:
<voice 00883_00005424><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 뚜…… 뚱땡이 고양이라고!?
　이 자식들, 내 검 맛을 보여 주겠다!!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5424.zh-Hans:
<voice 00883_00005424><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>竟敢……竟敢叫我肥猫！
该死的，非把你们削成碎片不可喵！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5424.zh-Hant:
<voice 00883_00005424><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>居……居然叫我肥貓！！
你們就成為我的劍下亡魂吧喵！！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5425.en: <voice 00974_00005425><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Wait, Cat Rebelio...<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5425.ja: <voice 00974_00005425><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「待つがよい　キャット・リベリオ……。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5425.ko: <voice 00974_00005425><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 기다려라, 캣 리벨리오…….<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5425.zh-Hans: <voice 00974_00005425><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>等一等，叛逆猫……<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5425.zh-Hant: <voice 00974_00005425><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>等等，叛逆貓……<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5426.en: <voice 01049_00005426><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Yes, Queen Cat Momma! But, these people are...<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5426.ja:
<voice 01049_00005426><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ハッ。キャット・マンマーさま。
　しかし　コヤツらは……。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5426.ko:
<voice 01049_00005426><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 예, 캣 맘마 님.
　하지만 이 녀석들은…….<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5426.zh-Hans:
<voice 01049_00005426><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>遵命，曼玛猫陛下。
但是，这些家伙……<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5426.zh-Hant:
<voice 01049_00005426><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>遵命，女王貓陛下。
可是，這些傢伙們……<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5427.en: <voice 01093_00005427><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>...I ordered you to wait.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5427.ja: <voice 01093_00005427><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「……待てと言った。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5427.ko: <voice 01093_00005427><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: ……기다리라고 했을 텐데?<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5427.zh-Hans: <voice 01093_00005427><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>……我命令你住手。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5427.zh-Hant: <voice 01093_00005427><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>……我要你等等。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5430.en: <voice 01300_00005430><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>What brings you all here?<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5430.ja: <voice 01300_00005430><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「そなたたち　何用で　ここに来たのかえ？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5430.ko: <voice 01300_00005430><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 그대들은 이곳에 무슨 일로 온 거지?<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5430.zh-Hans: <voice 01300_00005430><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>你们来这里有何贵干？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5430.zh-Hant: <voice 01300_00005430><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>你們是為了什麼來到這的？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5431.en: <voice 01344_00005431><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>We're here to return one of your people.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5431.ja:
<voice 01344_00005431><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「オレたちは　あんたらのお仲間を
　返しにきてやったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5431.ko:
<voice 01344_00005431><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 우린 당신들의 동포를
　돌려주러 온 것뿐이야.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5431.zh-Hans: <voice 01344_00005431><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我们是来送还你们的同伴的。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5431.zh-Hant:
<voice 01344_00005431><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我們是來
送回你們的夥伴。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5432.en:
<voice 01389_00005432><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Hey, <cs_pchero>. Let's show the little cat to this
big one.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5432.ja:
<voice 01389_00005432><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「おい　<cs_pchero>。
　あのチビネコを　このデカネコに見せてやれよ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5432.ko:
<voice 01389_00005432><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 이봐, <cs_pchero>.
　그 새끼 고양이를 이 거대한 녀석한테 보여 줘.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5432.zh-Hans:
<voice 01389_00005432><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喂，<cs_pchero>，
把猫崽给这只大猫看看。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5432.zh-Hant:
<voice 01389_00005432><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喂，<cs_pchero>，
把那隻小貓拿給這隻大貓看。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5433.ja: キャット・マンマーに　子ネコを　見せますか？<yesno><close>
5433.ko: 캣 맘마에게 아기 고양이를 보여 주겠습니까?<yesno><close>
5433.zh-Hant: 要把幼貓給女王貓看嗎？<yesno><close>

5434.en:
<voice 01517_00005434><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Give me a break, <cs_pchero>! What d'you think we
came all this way for.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5434.ja:
<voice 01517_00005434><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「おいおい　<cs_pchero>！
　なんのために　ここまで来たと思ってんだよ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5434.ko:
<voice 01517_00005434><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 얀마, <cs_pchero>!
　우리가 뭐 하러 여기까지 왔는데.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5434.zh-Hans:
<voice 01517_00005434><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我说<cs_pchero>！
你还记得我们是来干什么的吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5434.zh-Hant:
<voice 01517_00005434><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喂喂，<cs_pchero>！
你以為我們是為了什麼來這裡的啊。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5435.en:
<voice 01550_00005435><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I just wanna get home. Show the little cat to the
big one!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5435.ja:
<voice 01550_00005435><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「オレは　さっさと帰りてえんだ。
　このデカネコに　チビネコを見せてやれって！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5435.ko:
<voice 01550_00005435><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 난 빨리 돌아가고 싶다고.
　어서 이 거대한 녀석한테
　새끼 고양이를 보여 줘!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5435.zh-Hans:
<voice 01550_00005435><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我还想赶快回去呢。
快把怀里的猫崽给那只大猫看看！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5435.zh-Hant:
<voice 01550_00005435><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我想快點回去，
快把那隻小貓拿給這隻大貓看！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5437.ja:
<cs_pchero>は　キャット・マンマーに
子ネコを　見せた。
5437.ko:
{cs_pchero}|hpp(은,는) 캣 맘마에게
아기 고양이를 보여 주었다.

5438.en: <voice 01592_00005438><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Wh... What!? Th... That's!?<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5438.ja: <voice 01592_00005438><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「な……なにぃ！？　そ……それは！？<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5438.ko: <voice 01592_00005438><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 이…… 이럴 수가!? 그…… 그건!?<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5438.zh-Hans: <voice 01592_00005438><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>什……什么？！那……那不是？！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5438.zh-Hant: <voice 01592_00005438><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>什……什麼！？那……那是！？<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5439.en:
<voice 01712_00005439><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Oohhhh... Those eyes. That face. That loveliness.
There's no mistaking it...<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5439.ja:
<voice 01712_00005439><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「おお　おお……。
　その目。その顔。その愛らしさ。
　見まごうはずもない……。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5439.ko:
<voice 01712_00005439><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 오오, 오오…….
　그 눈, 그 얼굴, 그 사랑스러운 모습.
　내가 못 알아볼 리 없다…….<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5439.zh-Hans:
<voice 01712_00005439><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>噢噢，哇哇……
那眼睛，那小脸，那可爱的小模样。
我不会看错……<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5439.zh-Hant:
<voice 01712_00005439><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>喔喔、喔喔……
那眼睛，那小臉兒，那惹人憐愛的模樣。
我還以為再也見不到了……<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5440.en:
<voice 01746_00005440><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>It's my boy, Catrick. You... You're still alive after
all!<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5440.ja:
<voice 01746_00005440><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「まさに　わらわの息子　ジュニア。
　よくぞ……よくぞ　生きていてくれた！<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5440.ko:
<voice 01746_00005440><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 내 아들 주니어.
　용케…… 용케 무사했구나!<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5440.zh-Hans:
<voice 01746_00005440><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>真的是我的儿子修尼亚。
太好了……太好了，他还活着！<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5440.zh-Hant:
<voice 01746_00005440><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>牠的確是我的兒子幼子貓。
幸好……幸好你還活著！<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5441.en: <voice 01793_00005441><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Come now, give him to me!<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5441.ja: <voice 01793_00005441><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「さあ　ジュニアを　我が元に！<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5441.ko: <voice 01793_00005441><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 자, 주니어를 내게 다오!<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5441.zh-Hans: <voice 01793_00005441><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>快，把修尼亚送回我身边！<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5441.zh-Hant: <voice 01793_00005441><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>快，把幼子貓送回我身邊！<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5442.en: <voice 01861_00005442><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Give him back, <cs_pchero>.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5442.ja: <voice 01861_00005442><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「返してやれよ　<cs_pchero>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5443.en: <voice 01918_00005443><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Wait just a minute, meow!!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5443.ja: <voice 01918_00005443><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ちょっと　待ったニャア！！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5443.ko: <voice 01918_00005443><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 잠깐 기다려라냥!!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5443.zh-Hans: <voice 01918_00005443><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>等一下喵！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5444.en:
<voice 01967_00005444><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>How dare you, meow!? Are you trying to turn all my
plans into kitty litter!?<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5444.ja:
<voice 01967_00005444><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「キサマら　なんてことをしてくれるニャ！
　オレさまの計画を　水のアワにする気か！？<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5444.ko:
<voice 01967_00005444><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 너희 대체 무슨 짓을 한 거냥!
　내 계획을 물거품으로 만들 작정이냥!?<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5444.zh-Hans:
<voice 01967_00005444><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>你们要干什么！
想让我的计划打水漂么？！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5444.zh-Hant:
<voice 01967_00005444><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>你們都做了什麼好事！
竟敢搞砸我的計畫！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5445.ja: <voice 02032_00005445><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「……計画とな？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5445.zh-Hant: <voice 02032_00005445><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>……什麼計畫？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5446.en: <voice 02080_00005446><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>OH NO, MEOW!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5446.ja: <voice 02080_00005446><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「はっ　しまったニャ！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5446.ko: <voice 02080_00005446><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 헉, 실수했다냥!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5446.zh-Hant: <voice 02080_00005446><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>啊！糟了喵！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5447.en:
<voice 02150_00005447><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Well, whatever. It can't be helped. In a situation
like this, I'll just have to go all out.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5447.ja:
<voice 02150_00005447><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ええい！　バレちまったら　しかたない。
　こうなったら　ぜーんぶ　バラしてやるニャ。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5447.ko:
<voice 02150_00005447><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 에잇! 들켰으니 어쩔 수 없지.
　이렇게 되면 전부 까발리겠다냥.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5447.zh-Hans:
<voice 02150_00005447><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>可恶，竟然说漏嘴了。
没办法，干脆全告诉你们好了。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5447.zh-Hant:
<voice 02150_00005447><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>算了！穿幫了就算了，
我就老實告訴妳吧喵。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5448.en:
<voice 02207_00005448><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Keheheh... Want to know my plan, do you? The first
step's to take Catrick into the sea and kill him,
meow...<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5448.ja:
<voice 02207_00005448><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「くっくっく……計画ってのはな。
　まずは　アンタのジュニアを　海に流して
　亡き者とすることニャ……。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5448.ko:
<voice 02207_00005448><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 큭큭큭…… 내 계획은 말이지.
　우선 당신의 주니어를 바다에 버려
　죽이는 거였다냥…….<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5448.zh-Hans:
<voice 02207_00005448><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……我的计划的第一步
就是将你的修尼亚扔进海里，
让他变成死猫……<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5448.zh-Hant:
<voice 02207_00005448><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……所謂的計畫，
首先就是把妳寶貝的幼子貓
流放到海裡淹死喵……<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5449.en:
<voice 02370_00005449><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>And then, while you're wallowing in misery, I'll take
the throne, meow!!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5449.ja:
<voice 02370_00005449><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「そして　気落ちしたアンタを　ほうむりゃ
　次のボスの座は　めでたく　このオレさまに
　まわってくるのニャッ！！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5449.ko:
<voice 02370_00005449><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 그리고 낙담한 당신을 처리하면
　차기 보스 자리는
　내 차지가 되는 거지!!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5449.zh-Hans:
<voice 02370_00005449><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>然后再送一蹶不振的你上路，
那么下一任头目的宝座，
就是本大爷的囊中之物了喵！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5449.zh-Hant:
<voice 02370_00005449><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>然後只要做掉沮喪的妳，
下一任首領的寶座
就輪到我來當了喵！！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5450.en: <voice 02499_00005450><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Rebelio... How dare you!<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5450.ja: <voice 02499_00005450><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「リベリオ……。そなた　なんということを！<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5450.ko: <voice 02499_00005450><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 리벨리오……. 대체 무슨 짓을!<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5450.zh-Hans: <voice 02499_00005450><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>叛逆猫……你怎么可以做出这种事！<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5450.zh-Hant: <voice 02499_00005450><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>叛逆貓……你竟然如此惡毒！<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5451.en:
<voice 02585_00005451><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>But because of you lot, that plan failed, meow.
In that case, I'll just use brute force!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5451.ja:
<voice 02585_00005451><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「その計画も　キサマらのせいで　失敗ニャ。
　こうなったら　チカラ押しあるのみ！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5451.ko:
<voice 02585_00005451><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그 계획도 네놈들 때문에 실패했다냥.
　이렇게 되면 힘으로 해결하는 수밖에!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5451.zh-Hans:
<voice 02585_00005451><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>现在我的计划已经打水漂了，
那就只有硬来了！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5451.zh-Hant:
<voice 02585_00005451><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>不過計畫也因為你們出來攪局泡湯了。
既然如此，我只有強取了！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5452.en:
<voice 02642_00005452><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>First, I'll start with you. Then I'll deal with Catrick
and Momma, meow!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5452.ja:
<voice 02642_00005452><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「まずは　キサマらからだ。
　ジュニアとマンマーの始末は　その後ニャ！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5452.ko:
<voice 02642_00005452><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 우선 네놈들부터 처리해 주마.

5452.zh-Hans:
<voice 02642_00005452><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>先拿你们开刀好了。

19000968.en:
<voice 02969_19000968><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>For now, I'll protect the kitten and the brat from

19000968.zh-Hans:
<voice 02969_19000968><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>总之先保护好猫崽和这个小鬼，

19000968.zh-Hant:
<voice 02969_19000968><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>總之先保護好小貓跟這個小鬼，

<voice 02970_19000969><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 나, 나도

<voice 02970_19000969><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我、我也會

5456.en:
<voice 03106_00005456><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>GROOOWWRRR!!! DON'T CALL ME FAT CAT!!! I'LL BEAT YOU

5456.ja:
<voice 03106_00005456><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「うおお　ブタネコって言うニャ～～～。

5456.ko:
<voice 03106_00005456><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 으아아, 뚱땡이 고양이라고 하지 마라냥~~~

5456.zh-Hans:
<voice 03106_00005456><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>可恶，竟敢叫我肥猫喵！！

5456.zh-Hant:
<voice 03106_00005456><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>唔喔喔別叫我肥貓喵～～～

5458.en:
<voice 00060_00005458><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Rrgh, this guy... I thought I killed you, but it seems

5458.ja:
<voice 00060_00005458><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「むむっ　キサマ……。
　やっつけたと思ったら　まだ生きてたか。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5458.ko:
<voice 00060_00005458><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 응? 네놈…….
　죽였다고 생각했는데 아직 살아 있었나.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5458.zh-Hans:
<voice 00060_00005458><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>嗯？你……
我还以为干掉你了，怎么还活着。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5458.zh-Hant:
<voice 00060_00005458><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>唔唔……你這傢伙……
我還以為幹掉你了，沒想到你還活著。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5459.en: <voice 00105_00005459><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Sorry to disappoint, fat cat.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5459.zh-Hant: <voice 00105_00005459><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>真可惜啊，肥貓。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5461.en:
<voice 00218_00005461><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Hmph, sounds like a poor loser to me, meow. Regardless,

5461.ja:
<voice 00218_00005461><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ふん　負け惜しみにしか　聞こえんニャ。
　どのみち　キサマらも　ジュニアも
　マンマーも……<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5461.ko:
<voice 00218_00005461><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 흥, 허세 부리는 걸로밖에 안 보인다냥.

　맘마도……<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5461.zh-Hans:
<voice 00218_00005461><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>哼，不服输么喵。

5461.zh-Hant:
<voice 00218_00005461><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>哼，你儘管嘴硬吧喵。

5462.en: <voice 00365_00005462><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>I'll take you all down. Prepare yourself, meoooooow!!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00365_00005462><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「みーんな　オレさまが　ブッ倒してやる。

5462.ko:
<voice 00365_00005462><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 전부 내가 해치워 주마.

5462.zh-Hans:
<voice 00365_00005462><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>全部都要上西天。

5462.zh-Hant:
<voice 00365_00005462><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>我要把你們打得落花流水。

5463.en:
<voice 00151_00005463><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Guhh... I can't believe I'm losing to someone like

5463.ko:

5463.zh-Hans:

<voice 00279_00005464><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>If that's the case, I'll just take Catrick with me,

<voice 00279_00005464><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「こうなったら　ジュニアだけでも

5464.zh-Hans:

5464.zh-Hant:

5467.zh-Hans: <voice 00555_00005467><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你这混蛋……你太不讲理了！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5467.zh-Hant: <voice 00555_00005467><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你啊……還真是死腦筋！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5469.en:
<voice 00793_00005469><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...I'll never kill a cat. That's what I promised my
grandfather before he died.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5469.ja:
<voice 00793_00005469><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……ネコを殺しちゃいけねえってな。

5469.ko:
<voice 00793_00005469><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: ……고양이는 죽이지 않겠다고
