5469.zh-Hans:
<voice 00793_00005469><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我向亡故的爷爷保证过，
绝对不会杀死猫……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5469.zh-Hant:
<voice 00793_00005469><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……我不能殺貓。
我和死去的爺爺約好了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5470.en: <voice 00823_00005470><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Get out of here now...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5470.ja: <voice 00823_00005470><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「今すぐ　ここから消えな……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5470.ko: <voice 00823_00005470><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 지금 당장 여기서 꺼져…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5470.zh-Hans: <voice 00823_00005470><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>现在马上给我消失……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5470.zh-Hant: <voice 00823_00005470><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>還不快滾……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5471.ja: <voice 00907_00005471><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ひ……ひぃぃぃ！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5471.ko: <voice 00907_00005471><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 힉…… 히이이익!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5471.zh-Hant: <voice 00907_00005471><start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>咿……咿咿咿咿！<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000974.en:
<voice 00909_19000974><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Children of Men. We heard that the Ripple Tuning Fork
was broken.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000974.ja:
<voice 00909_19000974><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「人の子らよ
　波紋の音叉が壊れたことは
　わらわも　聞きおよんでおる。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000974.ko:
<voice 00909_19000974><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 사람이여.
　파문의 소리굽쇠가 망가졌다는 소식은
　나도 들었노라.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000974.zh-Hans:
<voice 00909_19000974><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>人类之子啊，
我也听说了
波纹音叉损毁的事。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000974.zh-Hant:
<voice 00909_19000974><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>人類之子啊，
我也聽說了
波紋音叉毀損的事。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000975.en:
<voice 00910_19000975><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>How could something like the Tuning Fork, a cornerstone
of our great continent, suddenly stop functioning?<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000975.ja:
<voice 00910_19000975><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「国の礎たる　音叉のようなものが
　急に　壊れたのはなぜか？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000975.ko:
<voice 00910_19000975><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 나라의 반석인 소리굽쇠가
　별안간 망가진 이유는 무엇인가?<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000975.zh-Hans:
<voice 00910_19000975><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>像音叉那种作为国家根基的东西，
怎么会突然损毁？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000975.zh-Hant:
<voice 00910_19000975><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>像音叉那種作為國家根基的東西，
怎麼會突然毀損？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000976.en:
<voice 00911_19000976><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>And why is it that the power of the straw is no
longer spreading to all of our kind and someone like
Rebelio has appeared?<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000976.ja:
<voice 00911_19000976><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「あるいは　わらわの力が
　同族たちに　あまねく　およばなくなり
　きゃつのような者があらわれたのは　なぜか？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000976.ko:
<voice 00911_19000976><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 그리고 나의 힘이
　동족들에게 널리 미치지 않게 되어
　저 자 같은 이가 나타난 이유는 무엇인가?<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000976.zh-Hans:
<voice 00911_19000976><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>或是我的力量
变得无法遍及所有族人，
导致那种家伙出现又是为何？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000976.zh-Hant:
<voice 00911_19000976><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>或是我的力量
變得無法遍及所有族人，
導致那種傢伙出現又是為何？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000977.en: <voice 00912_19000977><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...What? What are you talking about?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000977.ja: <voice 00912_19000977><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……なんだぁ？　なんの話だ？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000977.ko: <voice 00912_19000977><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: ……뭐야? 무슨 소리를 하는 거냐?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000977.zh-Hans: <voice 00912_19000977><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……什么意思？你在说什么？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000977.zh-Hant: <voice 00912_19000977><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……什麼意思？妳在說什麼？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000978.en:
<voice 00913_19000978><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>I sense an abomination, a great evil, may be
approaching our world.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000978.ja:
<voice 00913_19000978><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「わらわは何やら　忌むべきもの
　悪しき意志が　この大地を
　おおい隠さんとしているように思えるのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000978.ko:
<voice 00913_19000978><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 나는 아무래도 끔찍하고
　악한 의지가 이 대지를
　뒤덮으려 하는 것만 같구나.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000978.zh-Hans:
<voice 00913_19000978><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>我觉得这当中有某种不祥之物……
邪恶的意志正试图
笼罩这块大地。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000978.zh-Hant:
<voice 00913_19000978><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>我覺得這當中有某種不祥之物……
邪惡的意志正試圖
籠罩這塊大地。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000979.en: <voice 00914_19000979><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>We must not forget this turn of events.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000979.ja:
<voice 00914_19000979><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「この事を　ゆめゆめ
　忘れることなかれ。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000979.ko:
<voice 00914_19000979><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 이 일을 결코
　잊지 말거라.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000979.zh-Hans:
<voice 00914_19000979><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>这件事
还请务必放在心上。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000979.zh-Hant:
<voice 00914_19000979><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>這件事
還請務必放在心上。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000980.en:
<voice 00915_19000980><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>...Hmm, <cs_pchero>, did you say? It seems
you may know more about this than the rest of us.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000980.ja:
<voice 00915_19000980><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「……ふむ　<cs_pchero>と言ったか？
　それについては　そなたの方が
　骨身にしみて　知っているようだな。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000980.ko:
<voice 00915_19000980><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: ……흐음, {cs_pchero}|hpp(이라,라)고 했더냐?
　그 점에 대해서는 그대가
　뼈저리게 경험한 듯하구나.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000980.zh-Hans:
<voice 00915_19000980><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>……嗯，你叫<cs_pchero>是吧？
关于这部分，
你似乎挺了解的。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000980.zh-Hant:
<voice 00915_19000980><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>……嗯，你叫<cs_pchero>是吧？
關於這部分，
你似乎挺瞭解的。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000981.en: <voice 00916_19000981><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...Damn, I have no idea what all of this is about.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000981.ja: <voice 00916_19000981><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……ちっ　なんのことやらさっぱりだ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000981.ko: <voice 00916_19000981><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: ……쳇, 무슨 소리를 하는 건지.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000981.zh-Hans: <voice 00916_19000981><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……嘁，完全听不懂在讲什么。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000981.zh-Hant: <voice 00916_19000981><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……呿，完全聽不懂在講什麼。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000982.en: <voice 01082_19000982><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Aah, I get it... So, look, you're up, kid.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000982.ja:
<voice 01082_19000982><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ああ　わかったよ。
　……と
　ほら　お前の出番だぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000982.ko:
<voice 01082_19000982><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 됐어.
　……아무튼
　자, 네 차례다.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000982.zh-Hans:
<voice 01082_19000982><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>好啦，我知道了。
……对了，
轮到你啰。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000982.zh-Hant:
<voice 01082_19000982><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>好啦，我知道了。
……對了，
輪到妳囉。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5473.en:
<voice 01149_00005473><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>But, big brother Hyuza... This kitten is my...
My family...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5473.ja:
<voice 01149_00005473><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「でも　ヒューザ兄ちゃん……。
　この子は　私の……。私の家族……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5473.ko:
<voice 01149_00005473><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 하지만 휴자 오빠…….
　이 아이는 내…… 내 가족인걸…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5473.zh-Hans:
<voice 01149_00005473><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>但是，修萨大哥……
这小家伙是我的……我的家人……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5473.zh-Hant:
<voice 01149_00005473><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>可是，修扎哥哥……
這孩子是我的……是我的家人……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5474.en:
<voice 01203_00005474><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You know what it's like to miss your parents more than
anyone, don't you?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5474.ja:
<voice 01203_00005474><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「親がいない　さびしさは
　お前が　いちばん　よく知ってるはずだろ？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5474.ko:
<voice 01203_00005474><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 부모가 없는 설움은
　네가 가장 잘 알잖아?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5474.zh-Hans:
<voice 01203_00005474><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>没有父母在身边的那种凄凉感，
你应该理解吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5474.zh-Hant:
<voice 01203_00005474><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>妳應該比誰都清楚，
沒有父母陪伴的寂寞吧？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

39020.en:
<voice 01267_00039020><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You know how lonely that is. Are you gonna keep that
kitten away from his parents?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
39020.ja:
<voice 01267_00039020><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「その　さびしさを知ってる　お前が
　その子を親から　引き離したままにするのか？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
39020.ko:
<voice 01267_00039020><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 그 설움을 아는 네가
　그 아이를 엄마와 떼어 놓겠단 거야?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
39020.zh-Hans:
<voice 01267_00039020><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>深受亲子分离的痛苦所折磨的你，
打算让其他孩子也尝到一样的痛苦吗？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
39020.zh-Hant:
<voice 01267_00039020><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>深受親子分離的痛苦所折磨的你，
打算讓其他孩子也嘗到一樣的痛苦嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5475.ja: <voice 01306_00005475><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「そんなこと！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5475.zh-Hans: <voice 01306_00005475><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>当然不是！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5475.zh-Hant: <voice 01306_00005475><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>當然不是！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5476.en:
<voice 01558_00005476><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Young Weddie, you're the one who saved my Catrick's
life, aren't you?<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5476.ja:
<voice 01558_00005476><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「幼き　ウェディの者よ。
　そなたが　わらわのジュニアの命を
　救ってくれたのかえ？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5476.ko:
<voice 01558_00005476><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 어린 웨디여.
　그대가 우리 주니어의 목숨을
　구해준 것이냐?<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5476.zh-Hans:
<voice 01558_00005476><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>年幼的维迪啊。
是你救了我的儿子修尼亚的命么？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5476.zh-Hant:
<voice 01558_00005476><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>年幼的維迪族人，
是妳救了
我的幼子貓嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5477.en:
<voice 01648_00005477><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>This kitten washed up on the harbor in town. I thought
he was abandoned...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5477.ja:
<voice 01648_00005477><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「この子は　町の港に流れ着いてました。
　私　この子は捨てられたんだって思って……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5477.ko:
<voice 01648_00005477><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 이 아이는 마을 항구에 떠밀려 왔어요.
　전 당연히 버려진 줄 알고…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5477.zh-Hans:
<voice 01648_00005477><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>这小家伙漂流到了城镇的港口。
我以为他被抛弃了……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5477.zh-Hant:
<voice 01648_00005477><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>這孩子漂到鎮上的港口。
我想牠應該是被拋棄了……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5478.en: <voice 01697_00005478><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>I was going to make him my family... I'm sorry...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5478.ja:
<voice 01697_00005478><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「私の家族にするつもりだったの……。
　ごめんなさい……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5478.ko:
<voice 01697_00005478><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 제 가족으로 삼으려고 했어요…….
　죄송해요…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5478.zh-Hans:
<voice 01697_00005478><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>所以想让他成为自己的家人……
真对不起……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5478.zh-Hant:
<voice 01697_00005478><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>所以想讓牠做我的家人……
對不起……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5479.en:
<voice 01737_00005479><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>No need to apologize. All of this was because of my
foolish servant. You're not the one at fault here.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5479.ja:
<voice 01737_00005479><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「あやまらなくてよい。すべては
　わらわの愚かな配下が　しでかしたこと。
　そなたに　落ち度はない。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5479.ko:
<voice 01737_00005479><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 사과할 필요 없다.
　전부 내 어리석은 부하가 저지른 짓이니까.
　그대는 아무 잘못 없느니라.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5479.zh-Hans:
<voice 01737_00005479><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>你不必道歉，
一切都是我那愚蠢的部下造的孽。
你并没有错。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5479.zh-Hant:
<voice 01737_00005479><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>不必向我道歉，全都是
我那愚蠢的部下做的好事，
不是妳的錯。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5480.en:
<voice 01921_00005480><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>You've given Catrick the same love that I've given
him, haven't you? In that case, I must thank you.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5480.ja:
<voice 01921_00005480><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「そなたはジュニアに　わらわと変わらぬ愛を
　捧げてくれたのであろう？
　ならば　わらわは礼を言わねばならぬ。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5480.ko:
<voice 01921_00005480><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 그대는 주니어를 나처럼
　사랑을 담아 돌봐주었지?
　그렇다면 오히려 그대에게 고마워해야겠구나.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5480.zh-Hans:
<voice 01921_00005480><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>你将所有的爱都倾注在修尼亚身上了吧？
所以，我应该对你表示感谢。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5480.zh-Hant:
<voice 01921_00005480><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>妳為幼子貓傾注的親愛之情，
就如同我一般對吧？
那我得向妳道謝才行。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5481.en: <voice 02008_00005481><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Now... You can have him back.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5481.ja: <voice 02008_00005481><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「この子を……返します。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5481.ko: <voice 02008_00005481><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 이 아이를…… 돌려드릴게요.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5481.zh-Hans: <voice 02008_00005481><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>孩子……还给您。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5481.zh-Hant: <voice 02008_00005481><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我把牠……還給您。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5482.en: <voice 02195_00005482><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Oh, thank you. My son... I'll never lose you again.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5482.ja:
<voice 02195_00005482><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「おお……ありがとう。
　わらわの息子……もう　離さぬぞえ。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5482.ko:
<voice 02195_00005482><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 오오…… 고맙다.
　내 아들…… 이제 다시는
　품에서 떼어 놓지 않으마.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5482.zh-Hans:
<voice 02195_00005482><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>哦……谢谢。
我的孩子啊……我再也不会离开你了。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5482.zh-Hant:
<voice 02195_00005482><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>喔喔……謝謝妳。
我的兒子……別再離開我了。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000983.en:
<voice 02419_19000983><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>I thank you. You did a great job of looking after
Catrick.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000983.ja:
<voice 02419_19000983><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「そなたらに　礼を言おう。
　よくぞ　ジュニアを届けてくれた。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000983.ko:
<voice 02419_19000983><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 그대들에게 감사를 표하노라.
　주니어를 데려와 주어 고맙구나.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000983.zh-Hans:
<voice 02419_19000983><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>对你们，我同样表示感谢。
谢谢你们特地将修尼亚送回来。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000983.zh-Hant:
<voice 02419_19000983><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>我要向你們道謝。
謝謝你們特地將幼子貓送回來。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5485.en: <voice 02504_00005485><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Because of you, we were able to stop Rebelio's rampage...<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5485.ja:
<voice 02504_00005485><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「そなたらのおかげで　リベリオの暴挙も
　止めることが　できたのだからな。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5485.ko:
<voice 02504_00005485><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 그대들 덕분에 리벨리오의 폭거도
　막을 수 있었다.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5485.zh-Hans:
<voice 02504_00005485><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>也多亏了你们，
叛逆猫的暴行才得以制止。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5485.zh-Hant:
<voice 02504_00005485><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>多虧了你們，
才能阻止叛逆貓的暴行。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5486.en: <voice 02589_00005486><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Especially you, the one called Hyuza.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5486.ja: <voice 02589_00005486><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「時に　そなたは　ヒューザと言ったな。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5486.ko: <voice 02589_00005486><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 그런데 그대, 이름이 휴자라고 했지?<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5486.zh-Hans: <voice 02589_00005486><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>对了，你叫修萨吧。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5486.zh-Hant: <voice 02589_00005486><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>話說，你叫做修扎吧？<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5487.en: <voice 02674_00005487><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...What do you mean?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5487.ja: <voice 02674_00005487><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……なんだよ？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5488.en:
<voice 02703_00005488><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>I, too, swore an oath with my predecessor. I promised
that I would never kill a Weddie.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5488.ja:
<voice 02703_00005488><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「わらわもな。先代と約束したのだ。
　ウェディの者を殺してはならぬ……とな。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5488.ko:
<voice 02703_00005488><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 나도 선대와 약속했다.
　웨디를 죽이지 않겠다고…….<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5488.zh-Hans:
<voice 02703_00005488><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>我也向前代保证过，
不会杀害任何维迪……<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5488.zh-Hant:
<voice 02703_00005488><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>我也是。我和前代約好了，
不能殺維迪之人……<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5489.en:
<voice 02776_00005489><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>In the ancient past... It is said that the heroes of
our Giant Cat Tribe and the heroes of the Weddie tribe
joined hands in battle against a great evil.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5489.ja:
<voice 02776_00005489><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「遠い時代……。我ら巨猫族の勇士と
　ウェディ族の勇士が　手を取り合い
　巨大な悪と　戦ったことがあるらしい。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5489.ko:
<voice 02776_00005489><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 먼 옛날……. 우리 거묘족 용사와
　웨디족 용사가 힘을 합쳐
　거대한 악에 맞서 싸웠다고 들었다.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5489.zh-Hans:
<voice 02776_00005489><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>在很久以前……我们巨猫族勇士
曾和维迪族勇士联手，
一起与巨大的恶魔战斗过。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5489.zh-Hant:
<voice 02776_00005489><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>在遙遠的時代……我們巨貓族的勇士，
似乎和維迪族的勇士攜手
打敗了巨大的邪惡力量。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5490.en: <voice 02863_00005490><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Hmph. I'm not interested in that sorta thing.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5490.ja: <voice 02863_00005490><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ふん。そんな話にゃ　興味ないな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5490.ko: <voice 02863_00005490><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 흥, 그런 얘기엔 관심 없어.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5490.zh-Hans: <voice 02863_00005490><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>哼，那种故事我没兴趣。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5490.zh-Hant: <voice 02863_00005490><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>哼，我可沒興趣聽這些故事。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5491.en:
<voice 02917_00005491><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Is that so? Regardless, I'm going to keep that
promise, too.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5491.ja:
<voice 02917_00005491><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「そうか。だが　わらわも
　その約束は　守ろうと思っているのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5491.ko:
<voice 02917_00005491><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 그렇군. 하지만 나도
　그 약속은 지킬까 한다.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5491.zh-Hans:
<voice 02917_00005491><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>是么，
但是我也会将这约定遵守下去的。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5491.zh-Hant:
<voice 02917_00005491><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>是嗎。
不過，我也想遵守那約定。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5492.en:
<voice 02992_00005492><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Although there will be those who shall not agree with
me. They may turn against you. You may do as you please
with them.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5492.ja:
<voice 02992_00005492><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「とはいえ　わらわの意にそわぬ者もいるだろう。
　そなたらに　敵意を向けるやもしれぬが
　そのような者は　好きにして　かまわぬぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5492.ko:
<voice 02992_00005492><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>: 허나 내 뜻을 따르지 않는 자도 있을 터.
　그대들에게 적의를 드러내는 자들이 있다면
　그런 자들은 마음대로 해도 좋다.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5492.zh-Hans:
<voice 02992_00005492><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>只是，并不是所有人都理解我。
其中或许会有人对你们充满敌意。
那种人，你们随便处置就好。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5492.zh-Hant:
<voice 02992_00005492><start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>即便如此，也會有與我持不同意見之人吧。
牠們或許會對你們抱有敵意，
屆時隨你們處置也沒關係。<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000984.en:
<voice 03111_19000984><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I'm just settling up over here. Now that it's done,
we need to get back and report to the Mayor.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000984.ja:
<voice 03111_19000984><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「こっちの面倒ごとを　解決しただけさ。
　さあ　用は終わったし　帰るとしようぜ。
　町長に　報告に行かねえとな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000984.ko:
<voice 03111_19000984><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 우리 쪽 골칫거리를 해결했을 뿐이다.
　자, 볼일도 끝났으니 이만 돌아가자.
　촌장한테 보고하러 가야지.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000984.zh-Hans:
<voice 03111_19000984><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我们只是解决我们这边的麻烦事。
既然事情解决了，我们回去吧。
得回去向镇长报告。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000984.zh-Hant:
<voice 03111_19000984><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我們只是解決我們這邊的麻煩事。
既然事情解決了，我們回去吧。
得回去向鎮長報告。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000985.en: <voice 03170_19000985><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Well, quit screwin' around. Look, say your goodbyes...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000985.ja:
<voice 03170_19000985><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「なぁに　ウダウダしてやがんだ。
　ほら　ちゃんと　お別れを……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000985.ko:
<voice 03170_19000985><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 뭘 그렇게 꾸물거려?
　빨리 작별 인사나…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000985.zh-Hans:
<voice 03170_19000985><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>还在拖拖拉拉个什么，
好好跟人家道别吧……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000985.zh-Hant:
<voice 03170_19000985><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>還在拖拖拉拉個什麼，
好好跟人家道別吧……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001569.ja: <voice 09000_19001569><center>ヒューザ　聞こえますか？

19001564.en:
<voice 09000_19001564><center><pc> is on a journey to fulfill an important
mission to protect the world from a great evil.
19001564.ja:
<voice 09000_19001564><center><pc>は　悪しき気配から世界を守るための
重大な使命を果たす　旅をしています。
19001564.ko:
<voice 09000_19001564><center>{pc}|hpp(은,는) 사악한 기운으로부터 세계를
지키기 위해 중대한 사명을 안고
여행하고 있습니다.
19001564.zh-Hans:
<voice 09000_19001564><center><pc>为了完成重大的使命，
保护世界不受邪恶气息的侵害而旅行。
19001564.zh-Hant:
<voice 09000_19001564><center><pc>為了完成重大的使命，
保護世界不受邪惡氣息的侵害而旅行。

19000986.en: <voice 03171_19000986><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...Huh? ...Who is that? Whose voice is that?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000986.ja:
<voice 03171_19000986><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「…………あぁん？
　……誰だ？　誰の声だ？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000986.ko:
<voice 03171_19000986><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: …………어어?
　……누구냐? 누가 말하는 거야?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000986.zh-Hans:
<voice 03171_19000986><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>…………啊啊？
……什么人？这是谁的声音？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000986.zh-Hant:
<voice 03171_19000986><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>…………啊啊？
……什麼人？這是誰的聲音？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001565.en:
<voice 09000_19001565><center>You have the power to help <pc>.
Don't let the flame of hope die out for this world.
19001565.ja:
<voice 09000_19001565><center>あなたなら　<pc>を助けることができるでしょう。
この世界の希望を　絶やさぬように……。
19001565.ko:
<voice 09000_19001565><center>당신이라면 {pc}|hpp(을,를)
도울 수 있을 것입니다.
이 세계의 희망이 꺼지지 않도록…….
19001565.zh-Hans:
<voice 09000_19001565><center>如果是你，应该能成为<pc>的助力吧。
别让这个世界的希望断绝了……
19001565.zh-Hant:
<voice 09000_19001565><center>如果是你，應該能成為<pc>的助力吧。
別讓這個世界的希望斷絕了……

19000987.en: <voice 03172_19000987><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>What's wrong? Big brother Hyuza?<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000987.ja: <voice 03172_19000987><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「どうしたの？　ヒューザ兄ちゃん？<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000987.ko: <voice 03172_19000987><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 왜 그래? 휴자 오빠?<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000987.zh-Hans: <voice 03172_19000987><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>怎么了，修萨大哥？<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000987.zh-Hant: <voice 03172_19000987><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>怎麼了嗎？修扎哥哥？<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000988.en: <voice 03367_19000988><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...No, it's nothing.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000988.ja:
<voice 03367_19000988><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……いや
　いや　なんでもねぇ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000988.ko:
<voice 03367_19000988><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: ……아니.
　아니, 아무것도 아니야.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000988.zh-Hans:
<voice 03367_19000988><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……不，
没什么。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000988.zh-Hant:
<voice 03367_19000988><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……呃，
不，沒事。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000989.en:
<voice 03368_19000989><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...Look, goodbyes are best kept quick. Let's go
already!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000989.ja:
<voice 03368_19000989><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……ほら　別れってのは
　サッパリやるもんだ。
　もう行くぜ！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000989.ko:
<voice 03368_19000989><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: ……뭐 해? 작별은
　깔끔할수록 좋은 거다.
　그만 가자!<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000989.zh-Hans:
<voice 03368_19000989><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……好啦，道别的时候要干脆点。
我们走吧！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000989.zh-Hant:
<voice 03368_19000989><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……好啦，道別的時候要乾脆點。
我們走吧！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000990.en: <voice 03771_19000990><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>U-umm. Goodbye, my... Umm, goodbye, Catrick!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000990.ja:
<voice 03771_19000990><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「さようなら　私の……。
　ううん　さようなら　ジュニアちゃん！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000990.ko:
<voice 03771_19000990><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 잘 있어, 나의…….
　아니지. 잘 있어, 주니어!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000990.zh-Hans:
<voice 03771_19000990><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>再见了，我的……
不，再见了，修尼亚！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000990.zh-Hant:
<voice 03771_19000990><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>再見了，我的……
不，再見了，小幼！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000991.en: <voice 00085_19000991><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Ooh, <pc>. And Hyuza and Somya too.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000991.ja:
<voice 00085_19000991><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「おお　<pc>君。
　ヒューザ君　ソーミャも。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000991.ko:
<voice 00085_19000991><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc>.
　휴자와 소먀도 어서 오너라.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000991.zh-Hans:
<voice 00085_19000991><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>哦哦，<pc>。
还有修萨和索米娅。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000991.zh-Hant:
<voice 00085_19000991><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>喔喔，<pc>。
還有修扎跟莎米亞。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000992.en:
<voice 00125_19000992><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>It seems that you were able to return the little cat
to its people.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000992.ja:
<voice 00125_19000992><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「無事に　子ネコを親ネコに
　返すことが　できたようだな！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000992.ko:
<voice 00125_19000992><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 아기 고양이를 무사히 부모에게
　돌려준 모양이군!<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000992.zh-Hans:
<voice 00125_19000992><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>看来你们已经顺利把小猫
送回它母亲那里了！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000992.zh-Hant:
<voice 00125_19000992><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>看來你們已經順利把幼貓
送回牠母親那裡了！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5499.en:
<voice 00175_00005499><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>The cat monsters that've been prowling about the town
have completely vanished. The townspeople are relieved.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5499.ja:
<voice 00175_00005499><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「町の周りをうろついていた　ネコの魔物も
　すっかり　姿が見えなくなってな。
　これで町の者も　ひと安心というところだ。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5499.ko:
<voice 00175_00005499><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 마을 주변을 어슬렁거리던
　고양이 마물도 완전히 사라졌어.
　덕분에 마을 사람들도 한시름 놨네.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5499.zh-Hans:
<voice 00175_00005499><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>城镇周围的猫妖的身影也消失得一干二净了。
镇上的居民们终于可以松一口气了。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5499.zh-Hant:
<voice 00175_00005499><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>在市鎮附近徘徊的貓妖們
都不見了。
這樣大家也能暫時安心了。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5500.en: <voice 00265_00005500><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Don't get the wrong idea, mayor.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5500.ja: <voice 00265_00005500><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「カンちがいすんなよ　町長。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5500.ko: <voice 00265_00005500><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 착각하지 마, 촌장님.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5500.zh-Hans: <voice 00265_00005500><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>别搞错了，镇长。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5500.zh-Hant: <voice 00265_00005500><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你可別誤會，鎮長。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5501.en:
<voice 00299_00005501><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I don't think they'll come to town looking for that
kitten anymore, but they're still monsters, after all.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5501.ja:
<voice 00299_00005501><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「もう　あのチビネコを探して
　この町に　来ることはないだろうが
　あいつらは　しょせん　魔物なんだぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5501.ko:
<voice 00299_00005501><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 이제 그 새끼 고양이를 찾으러
　이 마을에 오진 않겠지만
　뭐가 됐든 그 녀석들은 마물이야.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5501.zh-Hans:
<voice 00299_00005501><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>虽然那些家伙不会再
跑到镇子里来寻找那只猫崽了，
但怪物毕竟还是怪物。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5501.zh-Hant:
<voice 00299_00005501><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>牠們或許不會
再來鎮上找那隻小貓，
但牠們可是怪物。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000993.en: <voice 00300_19000993><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Cat Momma is a good person... Not so much a good cat!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000993.ja:
<voice 00300_19000993><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「マンマーは　いいひと
　……じゃなくて　いいネコだよ！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000993.ko:
<voice 00300_19000993><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 맘마는 좋은 사람
　……이 아니라 좋은 고양이야!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000993.zh-Hans:
<voice 00300_19000993><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>曼玛是个好人……
不对，是只好猫哦！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000993.zh-Hant:
<voice 00300_19000993><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>女王貓是個好人……
不對，是隻好貓喔！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000994.en:
<voice 00335_19000994><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Haha... Just having no more cat monsters in town is
something I'm thankful for.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000994.ja:
<voice 00335_19000994><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「はは……　町の周りから
　ネコの魔物が　いなくなっただけでも
　私には　ありがたいのだよ。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000994.ko:
<voice 00335_19000994><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 하하…… 마을 주위에서
　고양이 마물이 사라진 것만 해도
　난 감사할 따름이지.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000994.zh-Hans:
<voice 00335_19000994><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>哈哈……但是对我来说，
镇子周围的猫妖能够消失掉
就已经很可喜可贺了。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000994.zh-Hant:
<voice 00335_19000994><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>哈哈……對我來說，
光是能讓市鎮周圍的貓妖消失
就已經很可喜可賀了。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5503.en:
<voice 00385_00005503><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Making sure that the people of Julet feel safe is my
duty as mayor.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5503.ja:
<voice 00385_00005503><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「このジュレットに住む者に　安心を与えるのが
　町長たる　私の役目なのだからな。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5503.ko:
<voice 00385_00005503><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 주레트 마을 주민들이
　마음 편히 지낼 수 있도록 하는 게
　촌장인 내 역할이니까.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5503.zh-Hans:
<voice 00385_00005503><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>因为保证玖莱特镇的每一个住民
得以安居乐业，正是我最大的使命。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5503.zh-Hant:
<voice 00385_00005503><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>讓這玖萊特鎮的居民們安心，
就是身為鎮長的我的使命。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5504.en: <voice 00485_00005504><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Hmph, how very magnanimous of you.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5504.ja: <voice 00485_00005504><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ふーん　そりゃ　ご立派なことで。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5504.ko: <voice 00485_00005504><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 흥, 참 대단한 촌장님 납셨군.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5504.zh-Hans: <voice 00485_00005504><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>嗯，那够了不起的。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5504.zh-Hant: <voice 00485_00005504><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喔？還真是厲害。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000995.en:
<voice 00486_19000995><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Big brother Hyuza again shares his colorful lingo
with us...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000995.ja:
<voice 00486_19000995><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「ヒューザ兄ちゃん
　また　そんな　ひねくれた言い方する……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000995.ko:
<voice 00486_19000995><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 휴자 오빠.
　또 그렇게 삐뚤어진 말투로…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000995.zh-Hans:
<voice 00486_19000995><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>修萨大哥
又在说那种拐弯抹角的话……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000995.zh-Hant:
<voice 00486_19000995><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>修扎哥哥
又在說那種拐彎抹角的話……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5505.en:
<voice 00535_00005505><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>You've done an outstanding job. You're deserving of our
town's Key Emblem.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5505.ja:
<voice 00535_00005505><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「君たちの　はたらきは　じつに見事だった。
　まさに　我が町のキーエンブレムを
　与えるに　ふさわしい。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5505.ko:
<voice 00535_00005505><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 자네들은 정말 잘해 주었어.
　우리 마을의 키 엠블럼을
　주기에 손색이 없을 정도야.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5505.zh-Hans:
<voice 00535_00005505><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>你们表现得太出色了。
的确配得上拥有我们镇的键徽。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5505.zh-Hant:
<voice 00535_00005505><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>你們立下了大功，
給予你們我鎮的鑰徽
也是實至名歸。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5506.en: <voice 00645_00005506><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Now, please take the Blue Key Emblem!<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5506.ja:
<voice 00645_00005506><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「さあ　この青のキーエンブレムを
　受け取るがいい！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5506.ko: <voice 00645_00005506><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 자, 이 푸른색 키 엠블럼을 받게나!<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5506.zh-Hans:
<voice 00645_00005506><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>来，这是青之键徽，
收下它吧！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5506.zh-Hant:
<voice 00645_00005506><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>來！
收下這個青之鑰徽吧！<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5507.en:
<pc> received the
Blue Key Emblem (Key Item)!<me 61>
5507.ja:
<pc>は
青のキーエンブレム（だいじなもの）を
受け取った！<me 61>
5507.zh-Hans:
<pc>收下了
青之键徽（重要物品）！<me 61>
5507.zh-Hant:
<pc>
收下了
青之鑰徽（重要物品）！<me 61>

5508.en: <voice 00860_00005508><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Of course, you get one too. Here, take it, Mr. Hyuza.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5508.ja:
<voice 00860_00005508><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「もちろん　君にもだ。
　さあ　受け取ってくれ　ヒューザ君。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5508.ko:
<voice 00860_00005508><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 물론 자네도 마찬가지야.
　자 받게나, 휴자.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5508.zh-Hans:
<voice 00860_00005508><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>当然，你也有。
请把手伸出来，修萨。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5508.zh-Hant:
<voice 00860_00005508><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>當然你也有。
收下吧，修扎。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5509.en: <voice 00910_00005509><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Don't need it.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5509.ja: <voice 00910_00005509><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「いらねえ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5509.ko: <voice 00910_00005509><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 필요 없어.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5509.zh-Hant: <voice 00910_00005509><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我才不要。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5510.en:
<voice 00950_00005510><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>What? But with this Key Emblem, it's easy to gain the
trust of other countries. It's a very useful thing
to have...<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5510.ja:
<voice 00950_00005510><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「なに？　しかし　このキーエンブレムがあれば
　他の国でも　信頼を得やすい。
　持っていて　損はないと思うが……。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5510.ko:
<voice 00950_00005510><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 뭐? 하지만 이 키 엠블럼이 있으면
　다른 나라에서도 쉽게 신뢰를 얻을 수 있네.
　갖고 있어서 나쁠 건 없다고 보네만…….<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5510.zh-Hans:
<voice 00950_00005510><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>什么？但是有了这键徽，
在其他的国家也会受到信任，
拿着它并没有什么损失啊……<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5510.zh-Hant:
<voice 00950_00005510><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>什麼？只要擁有這個鑰徽，
就能輕鬆取得他國的信賴，
對你應該好處多多才是……<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5511.en:
<voice 01020_00005511><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I'm not gonna rely on something like that. I'll get
people to accept me with my own strength. That's what
I decided when I left Leen Village.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5511.ja:
<voice 01020_00005511><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「オレは　そんなもんには　頼らない。
　自分のチカラで　人に認めさせてやる。　
　レーンの村を出たとき　そう決めたんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5511.ko:
<voice 01020_00005511><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 난 그런 물건에 의지하지 않을 거다.
　내 힘으로 남들에게 인정받겠어.
　렌 마을을 떠날 때 그렇게 결심했어.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5511.zh-Hans:
<voice 01020_00005511><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我不想依靠那种东西。
我要用自己的实力取得别人的认可。
离开雷恩村时，我就决定了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5511.zh-Hant:
<voice 01020_00005511><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我才不需要那種東西，
我要用自己的力量讓別人認同我。
我出雷恩村的那一刻就這麼決定了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5512.en:
<voice 01100_00005512><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>I see... Well, if that's the case, I won't force you.
Do as you please.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5512.ja:
<voice 01100_00005512><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「そうか……。ならば　無理にとは言わない。
　君の好きに　すればいい。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5512.ko:
<voice 01100_00005512><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 그렇군…….
　그렇다면 억지로 줄 순 없지.
　자네 뜻대로 하게.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5512.zh-Hans:
<voice 01100_00005512><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>是么……那好吧，我不会强求你。
一切随你所愿。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5512.zh-Hant:
<voice 01100_00005512><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>這樣啊……那我也不勉強你，
隨你的意願吧。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000996.en:
<voice 01140_19000996><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pc>, it's no coincidence that brought me
to you.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000996.ja:
<voice 01140_19000996><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「<pc>。
　……あーと　そうそう　これもなんかの縁だ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000996.ko:
<voice 01140_19000996><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: <pc>.
　……그리고 아, 이것도 인연이니까 말인데.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000996.zh-Hans:
<voice 01140_19000996><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pc>。
……啊——对了，这也是某种缘分。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000996.zh-Hant:
<voice 01140_19000996><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pc>。
……啊──對了，這也是某種緣分。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000997.en:
<voice 01141_19000997><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>For the time being, I'm coming with you. I wont take
'no' for an answer.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000997.ja:
<voice 01141_19000997><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「オレは　とうぶん　お前について行く。
　イヤとは　言わせねぇ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000997.ko:
<voice 01141_19000997><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 난 당분간 널 따라다니겠어.
　거절할 생각은 마라.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000997.zh-Hans:
<voice 01141_19000997><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我暂时都会跟着你一起行动。
你可别拒绝我哦。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000997.zh-Hant:
<voice 01141_19000997><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我暫時都會跟著你一起行動。
你可別拒絕我喔。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000998.ja: ヒューザが　仲間になった！<me 2401>

19000999.en: <voice 01143_19000999><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Don't worry, I won't slow you down, <cs_pchero>.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000999.ja:
<voice 01143_19000999><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「足手まといには　ならねーから
　安心しろ　<cs_pchero>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000999.ko:
<voice 01143_19000999><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 걸리적거리지는 않을 테니까
　안심해라, <cs_pchero>.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000999.zh-Hans:
<voice 01143_19000999><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我不会拖你后腿的，
放心吧，<cs_pchero>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000999.zh-Hant:
<voice 01143_19000999><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我不會扯你後腿的，
放心吧，<cs_pchero>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001004.en:
<voice 01415_19001004><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Well, <cs_pchero>. It appears you all intend to
continue your journey?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001004.ja:
<voice 01415_19001004><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「さてと　<cs_pchero>君。
　君たちはまた　旅を続けるのだろう？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001004.ko:
<voice 01415_19001004><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 자, <cs_pchero>.
　자네들은 다시 여행을 계속할 생각이겠지?<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001004.zh-Hans:
<voice 01415_19001004><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>那么，<cs_pchero>。
你们接下来还要继续旅行对吧？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001004.zh-Hant:
<voice 01415_19001004><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>那麼，<cs_pchero>。
你們接下來還要繼續旅行對吧？<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001005.en:
<voice 01416_19001005><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>If that's the case, you'd best take this with you as
well.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001005.ja:
<voice 01416_19001005><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「ならば
　これも　持っていくがいい。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001005.ko:
<voice 01416_19001005><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 그렇다면
　이것도 가져가는 게 좋겠군.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001005.zh-Hans: <voice 01416_19001005><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>既然如此，那这个也带上吧。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001005.zh-Hant: <voice 01416_19001005><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>既然如此，那這個也帶上吧。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001006.en:
<pc> received the
Intercontinental Rail Pass (Key Item)!<me 61>
19001006.ja:
<pc>は
大陸間鉄道パス（だいじなもの）を
受け取った！<me 61>
19001006.zh-Hans:
<pc>收下了
洲际铁路通行券（重要物品）！<me 61>
19001006.zh-Hant:
<pc>
收下了
洲際鐵路通票（重要物品）！<me 61>

19001007.en:
<voice 01418_19001007><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>With this, you can take a train that goes between the
five continents. You'll find it useful on your journey.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001007.ja:
<voice 01418_19001007><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「それがあれば
　５つの大陸を結ぶ　鉄道に乗ることができる。
　これからの旅に　役立つだろう。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001007.ko:
<voice 01418_19001007><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 그게 있으면
　다섯 대륙을 잇는 철도를 탈 수 있지.
　앞으로 여행할 때 유용할 거야.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001007.zh-Hans:
<voice 01418_19001007><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>有了这个，
就可以使用连接五大陆的铁路了。
日后在旅程中，它肯定能派上用场。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001007.zh-Hant:
<voice 01418_19001007><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>有了這個，
就可以搭乘連結５大陸的鐵路了。
日後在旅程中肯定能派上用場。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001008.en:
<voice 01419_19001008><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Consider it a gift from the town. You'll find the train
station down by the shoreline, at the end of the long
pier.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001008.ja:
<voice 01419_19001008><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「町のみんなからの　プレゼントだよ。
　鉄道の駅は　海に向かって
　まっすぐ歩いた先だ。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001008.ko:
<voice 01419_19001008><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 마을 사람들이 주는 선물일세.
　철도역은 바다 쪽으로
　쭉 걸어가면 나올 거야.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001008.zh-Hans:
<voice 01419_19001008><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>这是镇上的大家一起送的。
朝着海的方向直直往前走
就会看到车站。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001008.zh-Hant:
<voice 01419_19001008><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>這是鎮上的大家一起送的。
朝著海的方向直直往前走
就會看到車站。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001009.en: <voice 01420_19001009><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Hey, Somya, would like to say goodbye to <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001009.ja:
<voice 01420_19001009><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「ほら　ソーミャ
　<pc>君に　お別れをしなさい。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001009.ko:
<voice 01420_19001009><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 자, 소먀도
　<pc>에게 작별 인사를 하렴.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001009.zh-Hans:
<voice 01420_19001009><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>好了，索米娅，
跟<pc>道别吧。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001009.zh-Hant:
<voice 01420_19001009><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>好了，莎米亞，
跟<pc>道別吧。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001010.en:
<voice 01421_19001010><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Yeah... Thanks for everything, <pc>.
If you like, you can come visit anytime.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001010.ja:
<voice 01421_19001010><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「うん。
　……色々ありがとう　<pc>さん。
　良かったら　また　会いにきて。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001010.ko:
<voice 01421_19001010><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 응.
　……여러모로 고마웠어, <pc> 씨.
　나중에 또 만나러 와 줘.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001010.zh-Hans:
<voice 01421_19001010><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>嗯。
……真的很谢谢你，<pc>。
方便的话，再来找我哦。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001010.zh-Hant:
<voice 01421_19001010><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>嗯。
……真的很謝謝你，<pc>。
方便的話，再來找我喔。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001011.ja:
ソーミャが
パーティから　外れた。
19001011.zh-Hans:
索米娅
脱离了队伍。
19001011.zh-Hant:
莎米亞
脫離了隊伍。

19001012.en:
<voice 01450_19001012><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>Right, if you're in the neighborhood, please stop by
the town.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001012.ja:
<voice 01450_19001012><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>「そうだな　近くに来たなら
　ぜひ　この町に立ち寄ってくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001012.ko:
<voice 01450_19001012><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>: 그래. 근처에 오게 되면
　꼭 우리 마을에도 들르게.<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001012.zh-Hans:
<voice 01450_19001012><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>今后要是路过附近，
顺便来镇上做客吧。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001012.zh-Hant:
<voice 01450_19001012><start_lip_sync n00348 _normal m00001>是啊，要是有來到附近，
還請務必來鎮上一趟。<stop_lip_animation n00348 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001013.en:
<voice 00000_19001013><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pc>, I have something I need to take care
of in town.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001013.ja:
<voice 00000_19001013><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「<pc>　すまねーな。
　まだ　この町に　用事が残ってるんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001013.ko:
<voice 00000_19001013><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 미안하다.
　아직 이 마을에 볼일이 남아 있어.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001013.zh-Hans:
<voice 00000_19001013><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pc>，抱歉。
我在这镇上还有事要处理。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001013.zh-Hant:
<voice 00000_19001013><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001><pc>，抱歉。
我在這鎮上還有事要處理。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001014.en: <voice 00001_19001014><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Is it cool if we stop by Somya's place for a moment?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001014.ja:
<voice 00001_19001014><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ちょっと
　ソーミャのとこに　寄ってもいいか？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001014.ko:
<voice 00001_19001014><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 잠깐
　소먀네 집에 들러도 될까?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001014.zh-Hans:
<voice 00001_19001014><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>可以绕去
索米娅那里一趟吗？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001014.zh-Hant:
<voice 00001_19001014><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>可以繞去
莎米亞那裡一趟嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5518.en:
<voice 00056_00005518><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You've been trying to keep that kitten around because
you're lonely without your parents.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5518.ja:
<voice 00056_00005518><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「お前は　自分に親がいねえのが
　さびしいからって　あのチビネコを
　ずっと　手元に置こうとしてたよな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5518.ko:
<voice 00056_00005518><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 넌 부모님이 없는 게 외로워서
　그 새끼 고양이를
　계속 곁에 두려고 했지.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5518.zh-Hans:
<voice 00056_00005518><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你是因为没有父母而感到寂寞，
才想把那只猫崽留在身边的吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5518.zh-Hant:
<voice 00056_00005518><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>妳是因為自己
沒有父母覺得寂寞，
才想把那小貓留在身邊的吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5519.en: <voice 00106_00005519><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Is that still what you want?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5519.ja: <voice 00106_00005519><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「今でも　そうしたいと思うか？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5519.ko: <voice 00106_00005519><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 지금도 그러고 싶어?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5519.zh-Hans: <voice 00106_00005519><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>你现在还是那么想的么？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5519.zh-Hant: <voice 00106_00005519><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>妳現在也還想這麼做嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5521.en: <voice 00252_00005521><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>No, not anymore.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5521.ja: <voice 00252_00005521><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「ううん　もう思わない。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5521.ko: <voice 00252_00005521><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 아니, 이젠 아냐.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5521.zh-Hans: <voice 00252_00005521><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>不，不是的。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5521.zh-Hant: <voice 00252_00005521><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>不，我放棄了。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5522.en:
<voice 00311_00005522><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>If you have someone, it's okay to rely on them. But
if you don't...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5522.ja:
<voice 00311_00005522><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「頼れる相手がいるヤツは　そいつに頼ればいい。
　だが　いないヤツは……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5522.ko:
<voice 00311_00005522><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 의지할 수 있는 상대가 있는 사람은 기대면 돼.
　하지만 그렇지 않은 사람은……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5522.zh-Hans:
<voice 00311_00005522><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>拥有可以依靠的人，那就尽管去依靠吧。
但是，如果没有可以依靠的人……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5522.zh-Hant:
<voice 00311_00005522><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>有可以依靠的傢伙的話就去依靠吧。
但如果沒有……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5523.en:
<voice 00352_00005523><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You have to become strong yourself. So you can live
without relying on anyone else.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5523.ja:
<voice 00352_00005523><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「自分が　強くなるしかねえんだ。
　誰にも頼らずに　生きていけるようにな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5523.ko:
<voice 00352_00005523><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 스스로 강해져야만 해.
　그 누구에게도 기대지 않고 살 수 있도록.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5523.zh-Hans:
<voice 00352_00005523><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>就只能长自己的本事，
靠自己的力量活下去。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5523.zh-Hant:
<voice 00352_00005523><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>就只能自己變強了，
強到不用依賴任何人也能獨自生活。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5524.en:
<voice 00406_00005524><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>That's what I've been doing... And that's how I intend
to keep living.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5524.ja:
<voice 00406_00005524><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「オレは　今まで　そうしてきた。
　これからも　そうやって生きていくつもりだ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5524.ko:
<voice 00406_00005524><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 난 지금까지 그렇게 살아 왔어.
　앞으로도 그렇게 살 거고.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5524.zh-Hans:
<voice 00406_00005524><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我就是这么一路走过来的。
而且今后我也会这样一直走下去。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5524.zh-Hant:
<voice 00406_00005524><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我就是這樣，
而且以後也是。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5525.en: <voice 00467_00005525><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Yeah... I know.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5525.ja: <voice 00467_00005525><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「うん……そうだね。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5525.ko: <voice 00467_00005525><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 응…… 맞아.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5526.en:
<voice 00557_00005526><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>I'm not telling you to do that. Don't get the wrong
idea.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5526.ja:
<voice 00557_00005526><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「別に　お前に　そうしろって
　言ってるわけじゃねえよ。カンちがいすんな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5526.ko:
<voice 00557_00005526><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 딱히 너한테
　그렇게 하란 건 아냐. 착각하지 마.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5526.zh-Hans:
<voice 00557_00005526><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我并不是让你也这么做啊，
别误会了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5526.zh-Hant:
<voice 00557_00005526><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我不是
叫妳要學我這樣，別誤會了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001015.en: <voice 00602_19001015><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...By the way, <pc><stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001015.ja: <voice 00602_19001015><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……ところで　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001015.zh-Hant: <voice 00602_19001015><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……話說回來，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001016.en:
<voice 00603_19001016><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>That Cat Queen was saying she had a bad feeling...
You know anything about that?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001016.ja:
<voice 00603_19001016><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「あの女王ネコが　言ってた
　悪しき意志……ってのに
　本当に　心あたりあるのか？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001016.ko:
<voice 00603_19001016><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 그 여왕 고양이가 말한
　악한 의지……라는 게 뭔지
　정말로 짐작 가는 게 있냐?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001016.zh-Hans:
<voice 00603_19001016><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>那个猫女王说的
邪恶意志……
你真的有头绪吗？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001016.zh-Hant:
<voice 00603_19001016><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>那個貓女王說的
邪惡意志……
你真的有頭緒嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001017.en:
<voice 00690_19001017><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Nergel... She must've been talking about that Nergel
creep... Hmph, I see...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001017.ja:
<voice 00690_19001017><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ネルゲル……ネルゲルって野郎が
　そんなことを……。
　ふぅん　なるほどな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001017.ko:
<voice 00690_19001017><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 네르겔…… 네르겔이란 놈이
　그런 짓을…….
　흐음, 그렇군.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001017.zh-Hans:
<voice 00690_19001017><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>内尔格尔……那个叫内尔格尔的家伙
做出了那样的事……
嗯——原来如此。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001017.zh-Hant:
<voice 00690_19001017><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>內爾格爾……那個叫內爾格爾的傢伙
做出了那樣的事……
嗯──原來如此。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001018.en:
<voice 00691_19001018><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...So that means you're that <pc>? No...
No way...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001018.ja:
<voice 00691_19001018><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……ということは　オレは<pc>を？
　いや……いや　まさか……な。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001018.ko:
<voice 00691_19001018><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: ……그렇다면 내가 {pc}|hpp(을,를)?
　아니…… 아니지. 설마…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001018.zh-Hans:
<voice 00691_19001018><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……也就是说，我把<pc>给……？
呃……不、不会吧……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001018.zh-Hant:
<voice 00691_19001018><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……也就是說，我把<pc>給……？
呃……不、不會吧……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001019.en:
<voice 00761_19001019><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>It has to do with that voice back then? ...Ah, no,
at the Cat Queen's place, I heard a strange voice
telling me to go with you.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001019.ja:
<voice 00761_19001019><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「あの声は　それに関係あるのか？
　……あ　いや　女王ネコのところでよ
　お前について行けって　妙な声がな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001019.ko:
<voice 00761_19001019><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 그 목소리가 그 일과 상관있는 건가?
　……아, 그게 여왕 고양이 앞에서
　널 따라가라는 목소리가 들렸거든.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001019.zh-Hans:
<voice 00761_19001019><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>那个声音会跟这个有关吗？
……啊，不是，在猫女王那边的时候，
有个奇妙的声音要我跟着你走。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001019.zh-Hant:
<voice 00761_19001019><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>那個聲音會跟這個有關嗎？
……啊，不是啦，在貓女王那邊的時候，
有個奇妙的聲音要我跟著你走。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001020.en:
<voice 00762_19001020><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Big brother Hyuza! That means that Julet could be in
danger too, doesn't it!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001020.ja:
<voice 00762_19001020><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「ヒューザ兄ちゃん！
　それって　ジュレットの町も
　じきに　危ないってことだよね！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001020.ko:
<voice 00762_19001020><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 휴자 오빠!
　그 말은 주레트 마을도
　곧 위험해진다는 거잖아!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001020.zh-Hans:
<voice 00762_19001020><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>修萨大哥！
这就代表玖莱特镇
很快也会有危险对吧！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001020.zh-Hant:
<voice 00762_19001020><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>修扎哥哥！
這就代表玖萊特鎮
很快也會有危險對吧！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001021.en:
<voice 00763_19001021><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>I-I'm coming with you too, big brother Hyuza and
<cs_pchero>! We have to go protect Julet!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001021.ja:
<voice 00763_19001021><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「や……やっぱり私も
　ヒューザ兄ちゃんや　<cs_pchero>さんに
　ついて行く！　町を守らなきゃ！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001021.ko:
<voice 00763_19001021><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 여…… 역시 나도
　휴자 오빠랑 <cs_pchero> 씨를
　따라갈래! 마을을 지켜야지!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001021.zh-Hans:
<voice 00763_19001021><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>那……那我也要
跟着修萨大哥和<cs_pchero>走！
得保护城镇才行！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001021.zh-Hant:
<voice 00763_19001021><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>那……那我也要
跟著修扎哥哥和<cs_pchero>走！
得保護市鎮才行！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001022.en:
<voice 00764_19001022><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Like that time at the Big Cat's Nest, I can help you
fight!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001022.ja:
<voice 00764_19001022><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「巨猫の巣の時みたいに
　ふたりの戦いの　お手伝いする！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001022.ko:
<voice 00764_19001022><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 거묘의 보금자리 때처럼
　두 사람의 싸움을 도와줄게!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001022.zh-Hans:
<voice 00764_19001022><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>就像在巨猫巢穴那时候一样，
我会协助你们战斗！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001022.zh-Hant:
<voice 00764_19001022><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>就像在巨貓巢穴那時候一樣，
我會協助你們戰鬥！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001023.en:
<voice 00794_19001023><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>No, Somya. You stay here and protect the town. Leave
the big bad to us.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001023.ja:
<voice 00794_19001023><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「いいや　ソーミャ。
　お前は残って　町を守れ。
　親玉退治は　オレたちにまかせな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001023.ko:
<voice 00794_19001023><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 됐어, 소먀.
　넌 남아서 마을을 지켜.
　대장을 해치우는 건 우리한테 맡기고.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001023.zh-Hans:
<voice 00794_19001023><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>不，索米娅。
你留下来守护城镇。
打倒头目的事就交给我们吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001023.zh-Hant:
<voice 00794_19001023><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>不，莎米亞。
妳留下來守護市鎮。
打倒頭目的事就交給我們吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001024.en:
<voice 00821_19001024><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>That's right... To get on everybody in town's good
side, you have to protect each other together...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001024.ja:
<voice 00821_19001024><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「そうだな……。
　町のみんなと仲良くなって
　町をみんなと一緒に　守りきって……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001024.ko:
<voice 00821_19001024><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 잘 들어…….
　마을 사람들과 친해지고
　다 함께 마을을 지켜 내서…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001024.zh-Hans:
<voice 00821_19001024><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我想想……
你就跟镇上的大家好好相处，
一起守住城镇……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001024.zh-Hant:
<voice 00821_19001024><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>我想想……
妳就跟鎮上的大家好好相處，
一起守住市鎮……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001025.en:
<voice 00896_19001025><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Someday I'll return and you can show me how strong
you've become.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001025.ja:
<voice 00896_19001025><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「いつか　帰ってきたオレに
　強くなった姿を　見せてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001025.ko:
<voice 00896_19001025><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 언젠가 내가 돌아왔을 때
　강해진 모습을 보여 줘.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001025.zh-Hans:
<voice 00896_19001025><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>等哪天我回来时，
让我瞧瞧你变强的模样吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001025.zh-Hant:
<voice 00896_19001025><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>等哪天我回來時，
讓我瞧瞧妳變強的模樣吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001026.en: <voice 00897_19001026><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Uh-huh... I'll do it! I'll protect the town!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001026.ja:
<voice 00897_19001026><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「う　うん……
　わかった！　私　町を守る！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001026.ko:
<voice 00897_19001026><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 으, 응……
　알겠어! 난 마을을 지킬게!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001026.zh-Hans:
<voice 00897_19001026><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>唔、嗯……
我知道了！我会保护城镇！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001026.zh-Hant:
<voice 00897_19001026><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>唔、嗯……
我知道了！我會保護市鎮！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001027.en: <voice 01003_19001027><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Alright, see you then, Somya.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001027.ja: <voice 01003_19001027><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　あばよ　ソーミャ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001027.ko: <voice 01003_19001027><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 그럼 잘 있어라, 소먀.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001027.zh-Hans: <voice 01003_19001027><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>好了，拜拜了，索米娅！<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001027.zh-Hant: <voice 01003_19001027><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>那就再會囉，莎米亞。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001028.en: <voice 01115_19001028><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Take care, big brother Hyuza!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001028.ja: <voice 01115_19001028><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「元気でね　ヒューザ兄ちゃん！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001028.ko: <voice 01115_19001028><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 잘 지내, 휴자 오빠!!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001028.zh-Hans: <voice 01115_19001028><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>保重啊，修萨大哥！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001028.zh-Hant: <voice 01115_19001028><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>要保重喔，修扎哥哥！！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001029.en: <voice 01178_19001029><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...Quit calling me big brother.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001029.ja: <voice 01178_19001029><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……兄ちゃんは　やめろ。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001029.ko: <voice 01178_19001029><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: ……오빠 소리는 빼.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001029.zh-Hans: <voice 01178_19001029><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……大哥两个字就别加了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001029.zh-Hant: <voice 01178_19001029><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……哥哥兩個字就別加了。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001031.en: <voice 01457_19001031><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>I may not be as strong as big brother Hyuza, but...<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001031.ja:
<voice 01457_19001031><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「私は　ヒューザ兄ちゃんみたいには
　なれないかもしれないけど……。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001031.ko:
<voice 01457_19001031><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 난 휴자 오빠만큼은
　될 수 없을지도 모르지만…….<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001031.zh-Hans: <voice 01457_19001031><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我可能无法变得像修萨大哥一样厉害……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001031.zh-Hant:
<voice 01457_19001031><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我或許無法
變得像修扎哥哥一樣厲害……<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001032.en:
<voice 01484_19001032><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>I'll try my best to get on everyone's good side in
town and keep on living on my own too.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001032.ja:
<voice 01484_19001032><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「町のみんなと　もっと仲良くなって
　ひとりでも　生きていけるように
　がんばってみるよ。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001032.ko:
<voice 01484_19001032><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 마을 사람들이랑 더 친해져서
　혼자서도 살아갈 수 있도록
　열심히 노력해 볼게.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001032.zh-Hans:
<voice 01484_19001032><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>但是我会和镇上的大家好好相处，
努力让自己
可以独立活下去。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001032.zh-Hant:
<voice 01484_19001032><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>但是我會和鎮上的大家好好相處，
努力讓自己
可以獨力活下去的。<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001033.en:
<voice 01510_19001033><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Then, one day I'll grow up and see Catrick on Cat
Island. And then we can be friends too!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001033.ja:
<voice 01510_19001033><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「それで　大きくなって　いつか
　猫島にいる　あの子に会いにいくんだ。
　お友達になってもらいに！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001033.ko:
<voice 01510_19001033><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: 그렇게 쑥쑥 커서 언젠가
　고양이섬에 있는 그 아이를 만나러 갈 거야.
　친구가 되러!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001033.zh-Hans:
<voice 01510_19001033><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>我长大以后一定会去找猫岛上的那个小家伙。
我要和他成为朋友！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001033.zh-Hant:
<voice 01510_19001033><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>等我長大以後，
我要去貓島見那孩子。
請他跟我當朋友！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001034.en:
<voice 01590_19001034><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001><pc>, thank you for everything. Because
of you, I'll be okay from now on!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001034.ja:
<voice 01590_19001034><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「<pc>さんも　いろいろ　ありがとう。
　私は　もう　だいじょうぶだから！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001034.ko:
<voice 01590_19001034><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨도 여러모로 고마웠어.
　난 이제 괜찮아!<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001034.zh-Hans:
<voice 01590_19001034><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>谢谢你了，<pc>。
我已经不要紧了！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001034.zh-Hant:
<voice 01590_19001034><start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>也非常謝謝<pc>。
我已經不要緊了！<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

130614.en: <voice 00044_00130614><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>Oh, are you a traveler? Would you do me a favor?<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130614.ja:
<voice 00044_00130614><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>「あらっ。あんた　旅の人だね。
　ちょっと　あたしの頼みを
　聞いてくれないかい？<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130614.ko:
<voice 00044_00130614><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>: 어머, 당신 여행자 맞지?
　그럼 내 부탁 좀 들어주지 않을래?<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130614.zh-Hans:
<voice 00044_00130614><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>哎呀，你是旅行者吧。
能不能稍微帮我个忙？<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130614.zh-Hant:
<voice 00044_00130614><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>哎呀，你是旅行者吧。
能請你稍微
幫我個忙嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>

130615.en:
<voice 00101_00130615><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>In the northern part of town lives a girl named Somya.
She has been acting strangely lately. Could you check
on her for me?<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130615.ja:
<voice 00101_00130615><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>「町の北にさ。ソーミャって　女の子が
　ひとりで　住んでいるんだけど
　最近　様子が　おかしいのよね。<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130615.ko:
<voice 00101_00130615><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>: 마을 북쪽에 소먀란 여자애가
　혼자 살고 있는데
　요새 뭔가 좀 이상하더라고.<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130615.zh-Hans:
<voice 00101_00130615><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>有个叫索米娅的女孩子
一个人住在镇子北边。她最近看起来有点怪。<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130615.zh-Hant:
<voice 00101_00130615><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>有個叫莎米亞的女孩子
一個人住在市鎮北邊。
她最近有點怪怪的。<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>

130616.en:
<voice 00202_00130616><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>If I go over there I'll get in trouble. So I'd like you
to check in and see how things are going over there.<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130616.ja:
<voice 00202_00130616><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>「私が行くと　角が立つから　あんたに
　家まで　様子を　見にいってほしいのよ。
　何もなければ　それでいいからさ。<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130616.ko:
<voice 00202_00130616><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>: 내가 가면 괜한 잡음이 일 수도 있으니까
　대신 소먀네 집을 살펴봐 줬으면 해.
　아무 일 없으면 그걸로 됐고.<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130616.zh-Hans:
<voice 00202_00130616><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>我去问的话会惹她不高兴，
所以希望你能帮忙去她家里看看。
没什么事的话当然最好。<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
130616.zh-Hant:
<voice 00202_00130616><start_lip_sync n00467 _normal m00001>我去問的話會惹她不高興，
所以希望你能幫忙去她家裡看看。
沒什麼事的話當然最好。<stop_lip_animation n00467 CLOSE_MOUTH>
